text:
Cole Longland in the renewals team has been excellent. Very swift in responding, polite and helpful in his approach with a bit of humour thrown in too. Thanks Cole for all your support
Jane
Ilyas was easy to deal with and very efficient! Pricing seems good too.

The prompt and personalised service provided by Mobu Miah was integral to delivering this project on time ; Mobu remembered working with our company a couple of years ago and he displayed the same exacting professionalism and efficiency to arrange and address our requirements to our satisfaction.
Azizi is a delightful polite and extremly helpful person... I am so happy to have him as our contact!  Thank you!!  All the very best.  Phil
Our relationship with the team is good it's only the management that make things difficult although we can see some reasons like security!
Perfect service for our needs.
Impressed with the outstanding service provided by Vishali Jasat to Global Payment system. She has been very efficient and offered all the information required.

Alex Taheri was a great help when we were encountered with an issue.

Polite and Understanding

Nicola Walker was prompt in her response and assistance, efficient, knowledgeable and offered me all the information required to resolve my clients issue. I was delighted with Nicola`s assistance as was my client  and will always consider her for support in the first instance going forward.

Robbie was fantastic. So speedy with his replies and took the time and effort to thoroughly look into the issue and get it resolved very quickly.

It is greatly appreciated.

We decided to offer a card payment facility for the first time and were put in touch with Global Payments by our bank, HSBC.
Charlie Sweeney contacted us and took us through the various options to work out what was best for our business.
Charlie was exceptionally helpful and professional throughout the whole process.  He gave us honest answers, called us back when he said he would and did everything in his power to make the procedure as simple and convenient as possible.
We now have card payment facilities set up on both our companies which work just as we want them to, and which are very competitively priced.
The support after the initial set up by Charlie has also been excellent.
We would highly recommend Global Payments and particularly Charlie Sweeney.

Very efficient and personal service from Mobu Miah.
The process from switching form our previous provider was easier than I thought
Daniel Day, was very informative and took the time to explain my service better to me and through this discussion it appears that I have been able to save some money. Great!

I will not recommend this company.  I was not using this for a few months as we no longer needed it. I just checked my bank statement and I  have been charged around £90 per month for not using the account. £10 for the useless machine rental and £75 for non-compliance fee. I phoned them to request to cancel the account and I was told I need to do this in writing and they will charge £75 for restocking the useless card machine. I will never use this company again. I do not recommend this company to anyone. The online dashboard is outdated. Their monthly statement does not simply show how much you are being charged.  Outdated card machine, outdated dashboard,  inefficient complaints requirement, huge, surprising fees, and a penalty for closing the account.  there are many companies that do not do any of these. 

I have used a different company in the past. There are no extra fees for the card machine, no compliance requirement or theft of £75 per month for not filing the compliance form, and a great online user interface.

A big thankyou to Visahli Jasat!! From the start of the process the service provided has been outstanding. 

I had to add another 7 stores to Global Payments and at every stage any concerns or issues were dealt with efficiently. 

I could always make contact with Vishali easily and if she was ever busy would call me back or email over any updates.

Outstanding service, many thanks!! 

Matt 
Titan Self Storage

Terrible! When you call up they cant understand you and i cant understand them ! 
Simple questions cant be answered 
They pass you to department to department 
They have trouble understanding English 
Which is very frustrating 
Absolutely awful experience with them
Theres Hidden fees they do not warn you about
They need a new team that takes calls and understands English! 
so theres bot mistakes made that cost the customer !!

Ilyas was great from start to finish and very patient with us.
Highly Reccomended
Efficient and friendly, saved us some money. A pleasant experience.

Global Payments for our three business is always Delivered
Payments are always there
Rosie Murray was extremely professional from every point of view.
I made two calls about different things, and both advisors were extremely polite, helpful and efficient. I'm afraid I can't remember the name of the first advisor, but many thanks to you and to Aziz!

Excellent service by Vishali and was very prompt in responding all our queries to set up new account. 
Would highly recommend them.

Sure! Here’s something nice you could say:

A big thank you to Rob Mashuk and Sandra Sinclair from the Ingenico helpdesk for their help in sorting out issues at the pharmacy today. Your support is always greatly appreciated!

A special thanks to Rob for consistently going above and beyond over the past five years—taking time out of your busy day to resolve any problems we’ve had. Your dedication has not gone unnoticed, and we truly appreciate all that you do!
Charlie was fantastic in assisting me with getting my account set up and ready. Really friendly and helpful and had an answer to every question.

Azizi at Global Payments is very professional, efficient and focused on creating the most suitable package for your business. 
My business has been looked after by Azizi for a number of years and I’m thrilled to date with his service levels and genuine desire to want to save my business money. Would highly recommend.

I have dealt wth Puja Patel at Global Payments for a number of years and always find her efficient and helpful.
And again she has been great organising this years renewal.
Sarita handled my rate review enquiry, understanding my desire for a longer contract and delivered, additionally incorporating a beneficial terminal rental deal in the process. Much appreciated.

We made contact to discuss our current rates and secured a competitive renewal with the help of Tom Baines. Tom was efficient and dealt effectively with our query resulting in this 5 star review and confidence in future dealings with Global Payments.

Mo is always able to deal with my questions and issues quickly and accurately.  If something doesn't work he will find a solution or put me in contact with someone who can resolve that problem or answer that question.

He has saved our business many hours of unnecessary administrative work.

Definitely recommend very professional !!

We have used global for many years, they have recently introduced a loyalty scheme which is a great idea. 
On reviewing my contract I spoke with Bhav Parma who was absolutely brilliant, nothing was too much trouble, Bhav was both efficient and thorough.
Thank you for the great service!

I had a query with Global Payments.  The phone was answered immediately by Sarita.  She was courteous, efficient and professional and had all the authority needed to resolve our problem.  Within 5 mins of me calling, everything was resolved to our mutual satisfaction.  Sarita you were outstanding!
Puja Patel was excellent in providing us with a renewed agreement at reduced service charges in less than two days.
So much help and support with all issues from my allocated manager Vishali Jasat.  Honestly couldn't ask for a better contact.  Am very happy with the service that we receive.

Great service, prompt reply, very helpful staff.
Highly recommend!

Horrible organisation Over charges me for a long time !!! 
I didn’t received documentation and they give me a penalty for 5 month £70 per month without sending me email or call me ! 
Never again
Tom Baines was very helpful and sorted everything we needed.
We needed an urgent set up. Vishali Jasat achieved this within 2 working days.  Excellent customer service
I had a couple of queries and was put in touch with Azizi. Those queries were sorted same day and completely satisfactorily.
The customer service at Global Payments and in particular James Cherry, has been outstanding. Really clear communication from start to finish and the after sales service has been exceptional.
Charlie Sweeney was extremely helpful throughout the whole process.
Charlie Sweeney was extremely helpful when we was looking at our first card machine for our new business.
Global Payments is a professional platform. Alex Taheri is also a professional and responsive new business manager to lead us to the journey of using the platform.
Puja Patel provided a fast, helpful and pleasant service

I contacted Global Payments as we were reviewing our card payment provider and Charlie Sweeney got in touch to discuss their services. It was very clear what the terms were and the process we needed to follow and the transition was very easy and seemless. We are very happy with the service and also the ease of access to our invoices, statements and transaction details online.
Great communication from Charlie sweeney very good advisor and helped me set up my new machine highly recommended

Amazing service!!! 

Charlie Sweeny from Global Payments was fantastic throughout, easily contactable kept me up to date with all details. 

Very happy with my experience an asset to global payments team.
Great customer service and prompt assistance with password recovery from Robbie
Quick response & work done in time by Senior Sales Manager. Always helpful to assist quickly & promptly. Service provided so far is appreciated.
Always superb service, especially from Rob, has got me out of many problematic situations and nothing is ever too much trouble.
Amazing work by Azizi in retentions to resolve an ongoing issue with changing the name of my business on my terminal. He went above and beyond and followed up until the issue was resolved. Thank you
Tom was very prompt and helpful.
Global payments customer service were super easy contact on the phone and Bhav Parmer couldn't have been more helpful. he negotiated a new deal for us and a new smart terminal for our store.
Very nice and very good job
Excellent service

All perfect.
Thank you!
Fantastic customer service received from Azizi Arthur
we have moved from another card machine supplier and found the transition easy and seamless. We haven't experienced any issues at all.
Extremely helpful member of the staff called Cole Longland who listened and worked on our behalf.  Thoroughly recommend him
Very honest and straight forward help

Excellent customer service, expertise and guidance provided by James at Global Payments.
Highly recommended.  We did not hesitate to move from our old card provider.  Great savings made too.

Renewed with Global again - never had issues with them or their service and they do what they say they will - my contact there Elisabeth Wilson however is a different kettle of fish!! Nothing is too much bother and always there to help out or offer advise and help - she is the reason I would find it hard to leave Global

recently had the pleasure of working with Bhav Parmar at Global Pay, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the experience. Bhav was courteous and understanding throughout our interactions, taking the time to listen to my specific needs and concerns. He went above and beyond to ensure I received an excellent deal that perfectly suited my requirements. His professionalism and dedication to customer satisfaction were evident at every step. I highly recommend Bhav Parmar for anyone seeking top-notch service and exceptional deals at Global Pay.

I needed to change my business status and merchant account. Mo (Mobu) was superb at handling this painless process for me. 
I don't think in the three years I have been with Global Payments there jas been a single hitch. Excellent service.
Mo @ Global Payments was really helpful when I needed to create an additional merchant ID
Tom Baines was very helpful and a pleasure to deal with.
Was very helpful
Just signed up for another year. Fantastic company to deal with, always look after us with the rates.
poor service staff denied to cancel the membership

Azizi was really helpful all the way through my renewal process. Quick, efficient and really responsive. If it wasn't for Azizi I probably would have moved suppliers but they did such a good job with their customer service it convinced me to stay with Global Payments.
I opened a support ticket yesterday and within 10 minutes I received a response from Robbie Payne who had resolved my issue. What a great service. Thank you Robbie!

HORRIBLE SERVICE, AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

I cannot even begin to express how utterly disgusted I am with this company. After I made a clear request two months ago to cancel my card terminal, they completely ignored it. I was charged a shocking £300 for two months of a service I specifically asked them to cancel. Now, after countless attempts to get them to fix this, I’m STILL stuck in the middle of a cancellation process that is dragging on with zero communication from their customer support.

Their customer service is non-existent. Every time I’ve reached out, I’ve been met with either a complete lack of response or irrelevant, generic answers that don’t solve a thing. The level of incompetence and total disregard for their customers is beyond belief.

I’ve now been forced to jump through hoops for weeks just to get my account canceled, and they continue to charge me. This is nothing short of theft. Avoid this company at all costs—there are far better options out there. Their support is a nightmare, their billing practices are unethical, and they do not care about resolving issues.

If I could give 0 stars, I would.

Having been with another payment company that we could not get Apple Pay to work, we chose Global Payments after talking to Johnny Goldstone who assured us that Google and Apple Pay would not be an issue. He showed me current websites with it working.
Minor hiccups aside everything has gone smoothly and would highly recommend using Global Payments for your online payment gateway and retail premises.
Mobu is always super helpful and very quick to respond to corporate account queries.

Global payments have been brilliant ever since we started using them a couple of years ago. Customer service is on point!
Recently closed our business and Tom was a star getting all our accounts shut down!
Highly recommend global payments.
Johnny always responds quickly and finds solutions to our queries. He made the process very straight forward.

I have been unable to access my online account for 3 months. Despite several phone calls and emails to Global Payments, i am still unable to access my account. I have requested copy's of invoices by post (which i haven't received) and they want to charge me £5.00 to email me a copy.
I have now given them notice to terminate and they are trying to charge me for 2 terminals when we have only ever had 1.
AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COSTS
Kevin from Renewal team provided good service
Fantastic service from Cole. I was expecting it to be a real hassle but all was fine. Thanks Cole!!
Greatly appreciated the prompt and professional response from Daniel Daley. Made the process straightforward.
We are extremely pleased with GlobalPayment, particularly with the outstanding service and support provided by Johnny Goldstone.
Great service by James, super fast and takes control of the whole process
Prompt, professional service from Azizi, helpful adjustment on my terminal charge.

We have recently switched over to Global Payment, having had many issues with our previous Card Processing Company. James, our Business Manager has been with us every step of the way, answering all our questions, however small and been onsite helping with the deployment of our terminals. A fantastic service all round.
Puja was an absolute pleasure to deal with and made things very easy for me to follow and understand.
Great company dealt with Elisabeth Wilson she was brilliant
Comprehensive solution for all needs of collection.
Thankyou to liz and her team once again 5 star 🌟

We’ve been using Global Payments for our payment terminals, and we’re now in the process of moving all our online payment services to them. The experience has been fantastic, largely thanks to our account manager, James Clegg.

James provides exceptional service and responsiveness, often going above and beyond, even outside of standard working hours. His professionalism, expertise, and dedication make managing payments seamless and stress-free.

We highly recommend both James and Global Payments to any business looking for reliable and customer-focused payment solutions. A huge thank you to James for making everything run so smoothly!
total waste of money money product the which i choose its not working but still they charge the money 900£ per year call many times for cancellation but they not cancel the service
Sarita was very helpful guiding me through the contract renewal process.
Listened to needs and acted quickly.
Very efficient service from Azizi

Really happy with the service from Global Payments! They managed to secure us a great rate that improved our transaction costs. James, our contact, was helpful and efficient throughout the whole process. He was professional, knowledgeable, and incredibly helpful. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Global Payments to any business looking for a reliable and cost-effective payment processing solution

We switched over to Global Payments some years ago after bad experience with other card processing companies. Their service has always been great and prices are excellent. We've never had any issues or felt harassed in the way previous companies have treated us, they don't continually push up prices or try to lock us into a further 24 months. 

Our most recent experience was with Puja Patel who has done another year's extension of our good rates.

I had a telephone conversation with Bhav Parmer who contacted myself regarding our account, he was from the loyalty team, he discussed our account and because of our loyalty was able to offer some reductions in rates, it was so nice in the present climate to be contacted like this and for Global Payments as a company to recognise loyal customers, i found Bhav very pleasant and had all the relevant figures to hand, I have been contacted by other card companies over the years but have always stayed with Global as i find there is always someone helpful on the end of a phone who will do their utmost to help, i am one happy customer, and thank you Bhav for our conversation yesterday.
The personal service from Global Payments is second to none, especially Elizabeth Wilson, who went above and beyond to make the experience seamless when taking on board the new card machine facility.

Overall it was a poor experience starting with the delivery of the card machine . Although I was told , there wont be any hidden charge , I received a call from an American security company , Security metrics for compliance. This comes with an additional admin charge of £3/ month as well as fine of £75 if non compliant . I didnt sign up to this . Global payments  UK was dishonest in not alerting me to the involvement of a third party . I have since cancelled my direct debit with Global payment . No more trust .
Bhav is always really easy to deal with and always gives you a good deal
Sarita was extremely helpful. She listened to our business needs and produced a pricing structure to suit.
We were helped by Vishali Jasat for the implementation of the PDQ and payment services and we were not disappointed. Quick to response and reactive to our request, I recommend.
Great customer service every time
Azizi took the stress away from the renewal He emailed me around the renewal rate and gave us a competitive rate. he made the whole process very easy.

I had the pleasure of speaking with Bhav Parmar from Global Payments this morning, and I couldn't be happier with the service I received. Bhav took the time to thoroughly review our account, answer all my questions, and provide clear and helpful advice tailored to our needs.

The personal service was outstanding—friendly, professional, and efficient. It's rare to come across such genuine customer care these days, and Bhav went above and beyond to ensure everything was explained in detail and that we were completely satisfied.

Highly recommend Bhav and the Global Payments team for their excellent support and commitment to their customers. Thank you for making the process so seamless and stress-free!

Cut out the middle men and go straight to this company, why use reseller  . THEY do return your phone calls, they do everything they say. Rates are excellent . The service is the best i have ever had after 35 years in business.

We've just added another terminal to our account and the process was smooth and simple. 

Thanks to Cole for his prompt and friendly emails, he's always a pleasure to deal with.

All the staff I spoke to were very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable.  I struggled getting my head around setting everything up but the helpdesk talked me through everything and it turns out, it is remarkably easy to set up, I'm just a numpty :) .
Great experience
I am giving one star because you have to give a rating but would give zero to this company for sales management and the lies you are told to join this company
Mobu has been given us a support for each step.

Kevin D'Souza and Alex Taheri provide great service.  Global Payments are responsive, efficient and provide competitive rates for B:Music Ltd  (The charity that runs Symphony and Town Halls in Birmingham UK.)
Nice and straightforward.
EXCELLENT SERVICE - CREDIT TO YOUR TEAM
Daniel Daley Was very knowledgeable and helpful and resolved my issue efficiently. Thank you.

Nothing is too much for this company, Alex Taheri has supported our business and helped our business grow!

Anytime another provider wants to beat their price or take our business, Alex is happy to work with us to match or further improve our deal.

We will continue to grow and strengthen our mutual relationship for the future
Puja made renewing our co tract really straight forward. She responded promptly to queries and made helpful suggestions. Replacement terminal arrived promptly

Sorry Global I confused you with Worldpay who are shockingly bad!
No problems with Global.

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
Exceptional Service from Vishali Jasat!

I had the pleasure of working with Vishali Jasat, and I must say, she is an outstanding sales professional. From the very first interaction, she demonstrated excellent communication skills, in-depth knowledge, and a genuine commitment to helping me find the perfect solution.

Vishali went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met, and she made the entire process seamless and enjoyable. Her friendly demeanor and professionalism set her apart, making it a truly delightful experience.

If you're looking for a top-notch salesperson who genuinely cares about her clients, I highly recommend Vishali Jasat. Thank you for your amazing service, Vishali!

Terrible- payments being made and not coming through 3 weeks and still no resolution.  Going with another provider.  Also they do not send payments next day. Awful outdated service . Much better card providers out there and we are switching asap .
Terrible service. Problems from start to finish and the issue still hasn't been resolved. I have asked previously for somebody to contact me regarding this but nobody has.

I wanted to take a moment to share my appreciation for the outstanding support and service we've received from Global Payments, especially from Vishali in the Corporate Sales team. From the outset of our onboarding process, Vishali has been an absolute pleasure to work with and has played a pivotal role in making the experience smooth and seamless.

Vishali's approach has been nothing short of exceptional. She has been incredibly patient, understanding, and attentive to our specific needs.
GOOD COMMUNICATION SAME PERSON AS LAST YEAR WHICH IS RARE

We have used HSBC for our mail order and online business for many years and have always been very happy with the level of service and quick response time. We have recently added another service and everything was done very swiftly and the process up until now has been nice and simple
Great service and seamless set up.  Ilyas Elahi was a great help and was always on hand to answer any questions from demos to set up to live service. Would recommend!!
Got an amazing service ( i mean unbeatable rates from Puja Patel ) thankyou.
Sarita was a great person who got us the best deal

We have been using Global Payments for card processing at two businesses for over 10 years now, when they were HSBC Card Payments.

The service has always been excellent, in particular Daniel Daley has been particularly helpful over the years.

Very professional and extremely helpful.
He explained it in language that was easy to understand.

Mobu Miah the Sales Account Manager.
He service is remarkable & the rate are so much better than other providers.
Good customer service. All work done on time.thanks a lot MOBU..all the best .
Quick and effective assistance by Mobu thanks a lot !
My experience was was excellant Puja Patel was very professional quick to respond and I was very happy how quick she helped and supported me, very much appreciated!
Mobu was a great help in sorting out the card terminal

Azizi was fast, well informed, very polite and understanding and very easy to get on with.  

Really appreciate the swift turnaround on our account review and look forward to linking up again with him next year!

Cole Longland was extremely helpful in securing me a great rate. Noone else came close.
Cheers Global Payments
really great service well explained from start to finish answered all questions we had can't fault it in any way

Azizi Arthur
thank you for your help

Customer Success Team
Commercial & Retentions
I have renewed my contract today,Azazi thank you for your help good job as usual.
Cole was clear on new rates etc. Very helpful.
Beth Williams has been very proactive in smoothing the transition to GlobalPay
Soon after joining started getting spam calls with reference to global payments
Puja Patel understood what we were looking to do and took care of it with efficiency!

Great service and fast reponse from both the helpline team and customer success team helping me sort out an additional terminal. Thanks in particular to Puja Patel for the efficiency sorting out the paperwork, and the advice provided
Cole was very helpful and sorted out my enquiry and request very efficiently.

The sales person did not keep up the promise or committed offer. Pathetic professional ethos. You don't promise one thing and then update something else in the contract. The sale person Mobu Miah confirmed next day payment processing and then updated contract with 3 days payment processing without even keeping me informed.

Complaint raised and I will be leaving Global Payments if the committed payment schedule is not adhered.
Kevin was very helpful and efficient.
We have received a prompt reply. All our issues have been addressed and we have been offered favourable rates.

Withheld our customers payment for over a weeks 

Customer service via both email and phone was awful. I rang numerous times to receive the payment from a customer which was still not present in our bank account over 2 weeks later.they said by email that terminated contract and our company have to pay full contract rent and charges 
There was no justification for the hold up, nor were we told that they had the right to do this. We were just passed from pillar to post.called many times but investigator always in meeting in toilet or off like he hiding from situation 

We were left with no help, no questions answered 

Would not recommend, do research before signing up to Global Payments!

The platform works ok, but this company is so HARD to deal with. Can't provide a copy invoice by email (although I say copy, I haven't had the first one). Can't speak to a manager on the phone, Online account won't set up correctly. OK to take money from my account, but can't provide me with an invoice. 
55 minute call, and can't help, manager gone home, no one else in. 
As I said, frustrating.

The terminal was coming up saying BAD MAC, I tried to phone the helpdesk after being on hold for an hour and a half I had lost my patience, then I remembered the really helpful person Azizi who helped set up the terminal in the first place. I was so grateful to find his email address again, after 5 minutes of sending him an email he had come back to me with how to solve the problem and sent a step by step guide to enter on the terminal. Thank you very much Azizi Arthur, you are a life saver. Excellent customer service.
Arranging a new terminal was incredibly and the polite and "can do" service I received made it a pleasure to work with Global Payments.
Puja Patel gave us the best customer service, answering all our questions and finding a solution for our needs. Really happy with it!
Sarita was very helpful and gave a really good service, doing exactly what she said she would do. Much appreciated. Thank you

We have had a very short time to set up a new company. Compared to other providers who can take months to complete this process, Global Payments have been great in expediting the setup. Vishali Jasat has been a great help.

Charlie Sweeny account manager has set up my 15 retail locations very badly none of the machines are integrating ignoring my calls and emails and my business a s result is loosing money as we have no card facilities ignored. And we cant get any answers from anyone probably the worst business i have had to deal with in a very long time.

Have recently moved over to Global Payments and extremely happy with the level of service provided. Elisabeth Wilson  has been a great help setting up and transferring over. Any issues have been deslt with and resolved quickly and efficiently. Look forward to working with Elisabeth and Global Payments UK.
Prompt, professional and efficient customer service.
I dealt with a member of the customer success team called Cole Longland, and his response to my queries and requests was efficient and helpful.
Good Castomer service with Mr mobu miha.
good rate and everything you can check online

Having now renewed my GLOBAL PAYMENTS deal for an eighth year I feel happy that I have achieved the best pricing I could on the market.
Cole handled my renewal very promptly with quick responses to my e-mails and direct answers to my questions.
We were then able to agree rates and lock these in for the coming year. 
The documents came through the same day and were all done electronically. Our new additional terminals also arrived quickly.
I also had call to phone their customer success team - like the name - and again was well looked after.
Global may not be as well known as some of its competitors but I can only say good things about them.
Took a while to set up and didn't understand our corporate status. Got there in the end though and works well operationally.

Top class customer service from Mohomed Vindhani or Mo. He helped deal with my query in a swift, calm and professional manner. Getting to the root of the problem, and sorting it out quickly. Thanks Mo!
Having dealt with Mo (Mobu Miah)  before I knew I was in good hands. A very professional guy who deals with my queries perfect everytime. 10/10
Puja Patel was great and we were able to re-negotiate our rates to save some money.  Quickly put in place :)
He provided a very informative reply and a quick response
Battery low msg coming again and again can’t take payment customer get upset
Always great service from Global and our account manager IIyas Elahi, all requests done in an efficient manor.
Great customer service from Cole
he  explained the system very well. good customer service.
They dealt with my query quickly and efficiently once I go through to the right person.

Professional and efficient .
Easy to setup
Excellent customer service-quickly answered my query.

Excellent Service From İlyas elahi . He gets things moving very fast and always gives out great rates . Service is superb from him . Anytime of the day he will help out and keep you informed . Highly recommended .

The customer service was great and with the help of Puja Patel we got what we wanted in a prompt manner. 

Happy with the service.
We changed our Bank accounts and it was a nightmare trying to get The Head Office to change them. However, Vishali Jasat, our account manager took ownership and got them changed in the nick of time.
We get best of services needed. Our sales has improved. All money get credited to our bank. There is no issue of any disputes.

I have been a client of Global Payments for the past 8 years, and I have consistently experienced a high level of professionalism and reliable service from their team. My account manager, Daniel Daley, has always provided swift and efficient support, ensuring all our needs are met promptly. As a loyal customer, I am very pleased with the service and support I have received.

I want to personally thank Puja Patel for her support in getting a resolution to an issue I'd raised through the onboarding team and got no where.  Once  reached out elsewhere she was a super star and kept following up for me.  It was a painful process to get my refund and fees updated to the correct numbers but with her help I was able to preserver to get it sorted.
Thank you so much!

Great Communication. Quick and Efficient Service.
Very Pleased indeed.
The Sales Account Manager, Mo Miah, was very helpful and provided us with all the information we needed to make the right decision for the business. Thank you.
Very helpful and able to solve all problems.
Azizi was super helpful and very knowledgably  - highly recommend
Quick clear communication and helpful. Thank you
excellent service to renew our contract
Worked with Daniel Daley on our renewal. His communication was great and information informative. Rates were a great improvement from what we were previously on.

Cole was incredibly helpful, and one of the best experiences I have had in my life from any company. He made me feel very reassured, taken care of and pleased with Global payments for their service. Thanks so much Cole!
Excellent customer service from Azizi Arthur in understanding my business requirements

Its the people who are great rather than the business entity. Puja Patel fully explained the review process and guided me through the rates and varity of cards to ensure I was able to agree the best outcome for our business.
Very helpful in assisting with our requests and delivered a quick, efficient service.

Very efficient service from account manager Mo

Global payment had processed our cards for 4 years but we were renting the terminal from a third party who's customer service was not great. Mo matched the rate we were paying and quickly set everything up, he was was really helpful. Thanks Mo!

It was an absolute breath of fresh air to actually get through to a real person who spoke clearly, professional and friendly giving me clarity and understanding on everything we use and if we were faced with any issues what number to call. For me, who runs a small business and has a young child, time is.precious so it was a relief to sort what I needed with ease and quickly.
it would be great to have more Tom Baines as employees, a credit to the company and worth me taking my time to leave him a review. THANK YOU

Mixed views about this company, on the one hand the staff you speak to are very friendly and helpful, but there seems to be a delay of information getting to the right people.
We had to returned the old card terminal which was dealt with easily by customer services. But then month later we received a letter to say they hadn't heard from us, after many attempts to contact us?? Today  after contacting them again, spoke to Cole Longland who was very helpful and reassuring that the matter was dealt with.  He was also able to help with our renewal contract quickly.
A fantastic service from Azizi. Appreciate the effort gone in to organise a better rate.
Excellent service. Thank you for supporting my small business.

I've been a customer of Global Payments for probably a few decades (via HSBC) and have always been very happy with the service I've received so it is with a degree of regret that I find myself needing to resort to Trust Pilot, in order to get my message across to the team at Global Payments UK. I should start by saying that this isn't 1 star review, because I have just spoken to an incredibly helpful, professional and courteous customer service advisor about my issue. But my issue goes beyond what they were able to help with, so it's a 2 star in the hope that my message will still get noticed. Here goes..

What on earth is Global Payments doing, by partnering up with a company which is essentially a loan shark, such as Liberis.com !? I received an email from Global Payments offering a "funding solution" which basically involves receiving a loan which is repaid by deductions from your card payment takings. Sounds convenient and a great facility to take advantage of.

Only, upon getting a quote and doing my own calculations, the interest rate works out at approximately 125% per annum! Is this even legal!? What makes it particularly scandalous in my mind is that the interest rate is not actually disclosed because the facility is never referred to as a "loan" but rather an "alternative funding solution". I guess this is how they can get away with it. You would never know what interest rate you were effectively paying unless you worked it out. Extraordinary!

So funding (ie a loan) of £3000 would cost over £1000 in interest, paid back over just 4 months. This sounds very similar to the practices that were taken advantage of by the Payday Loan industry some years ago that I understand was finally clamped down on by the FCA. I guess the same protections don't exist for businesses, that exist for individuals.

My big concern though is that it is being championed by the well respected brand that is Global Payments. If I had received the email from Liberis (who I'd never heard of) I would have been more skeptical and not been suprised that it was a very bad deal, but because the email actually came from Global Payments and not Liberis (the customer service advisor I spoke to was able to confirm that the email from Global Payments was legitimate), I trusted the offer.

This experience has entirely undermined and sullied my trust in Global Payments. I never imagined that they would contact me to endorse a product which is so clearly in my mind, a rort.

If you receive any communication from Global Payments regarding Liberis, BEWARE! They are out to trick you. After choosing not to proceed with the application, I then received multiple follow up calls and emails from Liberis, trying to negotiate a better deal which was still over 95% pa in interest.

I hope that Global Payments will see the damage that this partnership with Liberis is doing to their brand and rescind it asap.

Dreadful company! Communication is dire, and when you do finally get to speak to someone, the phone is cut off. You can never get the same phone agent twice, and the left hand had no idea what the right hand is doing. I'm now being told to wait, up to a week, for a call back!

Update 02/01/24. Finally got a call back today from someone who had been told to call me, but didn't know why. I had to explain the whole thing to her, only to be passed to another department! It took him some minutes to decide that, no, the cheque I sent a month ago had not been processed, and he didn't know why. I now wait for yet another phone call. Hopeless service.

I've been using Global Payments for nearly 10 years and never had an issue. Initial call was made on 7th Dec, email task request was made on the 8th.......after being flobbed off 2 or 3 times it is now the 19th and still nobody has responded in kind.......
Fantastic service

Brilliant customer service by Stephen Lovie. Our card terminal stopped printing out receipts so I contacted the help desk and they advised that they will send out the relevant part but could take up to 5 days. This timescale was too long so decided to contact Stephen to see if he could help. Stephen responded quickly even though this was on Saturday. Luckily he had the spare part needed and came out the next morning (Sunday) and got my terminal printing receipts again. Thank you Stephen for going above and beyond, keep up the excellent work.

They got in touch within a day or two of my application. I worked with a Dwayne Higgins who was fantastic. Clear about the options available and was very helpful in finding the perfect option for me. Very proffessional and overall a pleasure
One thing is for sure, i can call Johnny anytime and he will answer the call and get the issued sorted.

Lee Botterill has been great for us, he has set us up with a credit card machine, pay link along with the option of taking payments over the phone. He has been super supportive for us a business and a credit to the team @Global Payments.

Kindest Regards 

Toni

I have used James Clegg, multiple times on multiple sites, he has never failed to impress me with his great customer service and efficiency, he is best at his jobs, found amazing rates and saved me a lot of money, I highly recommend anyone who’s looking to switch their card machine services.

Communication was great with timely responses to our queries. Dipesh was extremely helpful in explaining how our requests for services would be handled internally and what we could expect and by  when. He was very flexible in his approach when the timelines of our digital project changed. All in all a really positive experience with good communication at the heart of this.

Dipesh has looked after my card terminal needs for a few years now for all my stores , i can honestly say he is a credit to global payments, he is always available when we need him either for a new terminal or if there is an issue with anything. Well done Dipesh!!

Rubbish ordered a mobile pay machine can’t use contactless had it for months and still haven’t got it sorted.
Most complicated set up ever. I’ve used two other mobile pay companies and never had the hassle I’ve had with this one. Won’t be using it the only think it’s good for is the bin. When I have taken payments with people putting their PIN numbers in there’s no way to see easily what your card charges are for book keeping so another boring problem to add to the collection of irritations that you get when using this ! 
The only positive is one poor guy who’s been as helpful as he can trying to sort it out, and that was after spending hours on the phone talking to their standard  Customer service people that didn’t have a clue what to do and kept passing me round. I only got the other guy as I didn’t use the machine for months because initially I couldn’t even put a card in without inputting the number manually !

I would like to express my sincere thanks to the Ecom team for their continuous support and attention to our needs. Vamos has been an Ecom (and Elavon) customer for more than 10 years and that's largely due to the high level support we have enjoyed from Ecom's team. Most recently that has involved Elmer and John and so a special thanks goes out to them.

Thank you Global payments! How easy it was to contact CS and deal with the same person from over a year ago, who offered the same high standard of customer service and swift resolution to my query, and an even better transaction rate than before.
Well done Azizi they have a real asset in you!
Hasan is very professional and great customer service!

We have been with Global Payments for a few years now and never had any issues, until we 'upgraded' our terminals 3 months ago and since then it has been one thing after another with the new terminals. So many mistakes from back office Global Pay employees from sending us the wrong replacement terminal to sending us a terminal linked to another company's MID. It has been a 3 month headache and finally we decided to go back to our original Ingenico terminals as the new ones are just terrible. Our contact Stephen Lovie has been the only consistent thing throughout this, always contactable and happy to help where he can. Stephen has just gone round all 5 of our venues and personally swapped all the terminals back to the original design for us since we've had such a nightmare already. If it wasn't for Stephen we would have moved service providers over this but I am happy to have Stephen in our corner. Fingers crossed we go back to having no more issues with the card machines we know and have experience with.

We wanted a secure payment system and an E-commerce payment platform to help augment our sales growth and our bankers recommended Global Payments.  We were pleased about how the project was scoped and the solution delivered to a very high standard.  Most importantly all are team members who operate the system attest to its efficiency and ease of use. We would gladly recommend Global Payments to anyone seeking to optimise their payment systems.

My experience with GlobalPay has been nothing short of exceptional, thanks in large part to the incredible service provided by Ilyas and Adam. From the beginning, Ilyas impressed me with his thoroughness, diligence, and first-class communication. He played a pivotal role in setting up my accounts swiftly and efficiently, demonstrating professionalism that is a rare find today.

What truly stood out about Ilyas was his extraordinary commitment. His willingness to go above and beyond, even during his holiday, to meet crucial timelines was remarkable. This level of dedication and flexibility in ensuring client satisfaction is what sets GlobalPay apart.

Adam, another member of the GlobalPay team, was also instrumental in this positive experience. Like Ilyas, Adam displayed great flexibility and helpfulness throughout the process. His efforts complemented Ilyas’s work perfectly, creating a seamless and efficient service experience. Together, they formed a formidable team, making sure that all my needs were met with the utmost attention and care.

Their collective actions resulted in a smooth, stress-free process for setting up my accounts, highlighting the efficiency and client-focused approach of GlobalPay. It’s refreshing to see such a high level of personal care and attention in the financial services sector.

In conclusion, I would highly recommend GlobalPay for anyone in need of reliable and customer-centric financial services. The outstanding service provided by Ilyas and Adam truly reflects the company’s commitment to excellence. A big thank you to both of them for their exceptional work and dedication. Their professionalism and ability to deliver under pressure are commendable and greatly appreciated.

Contacted Global Payments UK and spoke to Azizi about the replacement and acquisition of new card payment terminals. First class service from start to finish. An extremely prompt and clear response to my queries and was able to process my order in a matter of hours. I have dealt with a number of different organisations and the professionalism shown here was second to none.

I received exceptional service from Mandeep Kaur!! She took the time to understand my needs as a small business and went above and beyond to meet them. She broke down the jargon and offered great advice whilst also being professional and efficient! Highly recommend!

very professional quick response and efficient.
An asset to your company Liz thankyou again.
Absolutely worst company and would not recommend any business to use them! Horrible service, horrible support and left my business in a bad position.

Beth W our account manager has been fantastic since we joined Global. Hats off to Beth, she got us some great rates and we made a huge saving. She's also always quick to respond to emails and happy to help with any questions.

Update: Missing charging dock delivered as promised. Very happy with service

Dealing with Steve lovie has been a joy! Made the deal easy an easy decision!
Stephen Lovie has been very helpful with a number of our company initiatives since he took over as our RM. Keep up the good work Stephen!

The service provided to us was and continues to be fantastic. With someone with little to no knowledge of how to receive and transfer MIDS etc., this was explained thoroughly from start to finish by Steven Lovie. Response time from Stephen is fantastic and nothing is too much, whether this is implementing tasks or receiving advice, his knowledge base not just within his role but within other areas of the sector in terms of the POS system we use is brilliant he was able to advise and even contact our provider to help with smooth transitions.

Terrible. We had a customer scam us by falsely initiating a charge back with their card issuer, stating they never received their goods, so GP charged us £25 for the privilege, then we defended it with plenty of proof of delivery, photographs GPS coords, GP credited the funds back to us and charged us £25 for the privilege, then the scammers card issuer refused the evidence and so GP took their money back again AND charged me £25 for the privilege, £75 in total and absolutely no defence of my case, they just rolled over and allowed the card issuer to have their way and allowed a criminal to get away with a scam.

GP are profiteering from their customers misfortune and allowing scammers to get away with claiming their money back and keeping their goods, businesses know not to bother defending false, illegal chargebacks as they know the buyer will get their money back AND keep the item they've scammed.

So, I've lost the money from the sale, the products we sent and £75 lighter thanks to GP, totally despicable.

This is a shout out to NAS (Ali Naseem). After experiencing problems with our terminal and unable to process payments for 5 days, and speaking to A LOT of customer service providers. It was finally Nas who calmly and patiently went through everything and identified the issue. What a relief and big thanks Nas!

We moved our business over to Global Payments 2 years ago and have enjoyed continual great service. Our account manager, Elisabeth Wilson, is always available to help and any actions are prompt and efficiently handled. Its not often I can say I am happy with our card merchant!

I have to say everything Elisabeth Wilson does is great she is not pushy for a sale very humble polite patient well mannered a great business manner I fully recommended her I have never met anyone like herself supplying card machines
Fantastic service from Elisabeth!

Mandeep was brilliant from start to finish. She assisted from first enquireies up final set up. The mobile card machine is great, it provides contactless, chip & pin, swipe and also allows you to input cash sales to help keep your records accurate to the account! Once the transaction is complete you can also send a receipt directly to your customers mobile phone number or email. I definitely recommend Global Payments and I look forward to them providing many years of service to us as our business hopefully continues to grow!

We are suffering from loss of business since 6th November 5:30pm.
Both our card machines are not working and all our customers have gone back.
Our sales have completely dropped.

We were told by customer services that new machines would be sent out to us and would reach us on 8th November which is yesterday; but no machines have been delivered.
When I called them they said the status is pending and they don't know when I can get the machines.

Global payments have let us down terribly and we will make sure we do not continue with global payments again.

What's absolutely appalling is that we haven't received a single call or email to say why the machines have been delayed or not sent out as yet.
We have made over 30 calls to customer service, which is based in the Philippines and have limited resources to help us. We haven't received a single call back until now; today being the 4th day running!!

Having been with you for over 3 years I was scammed with someone using a fraudulent card to pay for goods in my small flower shop totalling £5000 much to my dismay I couldn’t get anything back from no one . Having paid back the money out of my account you took it a further 2 times .I have lost my business now because you had to investigate but no body cared I cannot stress how important you should look after your customers I was dealt with very badly.

We worked with Ilyas Elahi to migrate our payment services onto the Global Payments platform. Our business uses Globalpay and have found them to be reliable and provide a fantastic after sales service. We recently required a temporary machine and it was organised by Alex who was really helpful and provided a friendly efficient service.
Excellent Service
Mandeep assisted me excellently throughout the entire process with great care and active communication. I would recommend her services in a heartbeat.

Azizi at Global Payments was extremely friendly, knowledgeable, efficient and helpful, explaining everything clearly and precisely. Not pushy in the slightest unlike my experience with other companies! Would highly recommend Global Payments. 5*

We have been using Global Payments for nearly 10yrs now and I'd highly recommend them.
Our Account Manager, Rob Mashuk, is absolutely wonderful; always quick to return calls or emails and, more importantly, always ready to step in to help solve queries or problems that inevitably arise. 

We recently reviewed our costs as part of a tech review and Rob was all to happy to look at our rates and make sure we were on the most competitive tariff. We subsequently switched payment terminals requiring new merchant ID's and Rob has been happy to babysit me through the set up and implementation which has made this a much easier transition than anticipated.
Efficient and helpful service from Azizi, with everything dealt with swiftly.

I have been a customer of Global Payments since 1996. For some unknown reason they closed our account by mistake at the end of last week and so we are unable to use our retail terminal. Despite calling them daily and with the promise of someone will call back to explain and rectify the situation nobody does. We are a profitable business, never had a charge back, rarely have any refunds and bills are always paid by direct debit. This is terrible service.

The speed at which information was provided and dealt with were all excellent. Within a few hours, contract was signed, and delivery of terminal information was shared.

I would like to thank James Cherry for his excellent service.

It was a delight to work with James Clegg at Global Payments to help us assist with a request in setting up a new Merchant ID. The service form him was truly exceptional and he recognized a need for urgent assistance on this matter and expedited our request at Global Payments so we were issued with a Merchant ID in record time. Would highly recommend him and would hope to work with him again for any future needs.
From my call to them this week, Global Payments have handled my issue promptly and professionally, in particalr Puja who has been very attentive. Excellent customer service. Would recommend.

I was impressed by the attitude of our consultant, Mr. Johny Goldstone, who was seting up the system for us. He was very helpful, always reacted quicky and he was able to answer all our questions right away.

Our rep (Jo Warner) is always on hand to help with any enquiry or problem. Nothing too big or too small. Easy to reach via email or direct phone.

The generic Global Payments help lines / email contacts are not good, but Jo more than makes up for this.

On a change from the old VISA machines to new Android ones, we were sent 2 machines. We only needed one, so stored the 2nd away. After a week of putting transactions through the new terminal we didn't get any payments. Looking at the receipts to take a photo for a record, and to send them, we noticed that the header was that of another company. The terminal had been sent to us by mistake, and the sales had gone to the company listed as the terminal owner. Complaining about it produced no resolution except for them to collect the wrong terminal. I got a reference number for the complaint and a promise that they would call me back, but have never done so. All calls seem to end up in India and speaking to them, apart from difficulties in understanding them, only produces promises that a senior supervisor would call me back. They never do.
Personally I believe there are better systems out there and I'm currently looking to cancel my contract with Global Payments.
-------------------------------------------------------------
25/10/23
Following this review I was contacted by someone, I believe who calls himself Rod, where my complaint was escalated to. I was promised that the payments sent to another company would be put back into my account by Friday 20/10/23, then come Friday I got another call saying it would be Monday or Tuesday. It's now Wednesday 25/10/23, and yeah - no fulfilment of that promise as expected. In the meantime I had a payment taken for monthly charges even though the use of the terminal was largely denied by my having the wrong terminal. I was also promised that this monthly charge would be reversed. I hate to say it BUT that promise has also failed to materialise.
I won't accept any more verbal promises. Only the return of the misplaced payments and the return of the monthly charge paid into my bank account TODAY will be taken as goodwill. How they do it, is down to them but they have my bank account details, they know how much went missing, and how much the last month's charges were. 
I was also promised another 3 months waiver of charges but after all this failure to act properly I now say that the 3 months should be upped to 6 months.
-------------------------------------------------------------
26/10/23
Monday, Tuesday went by with no result. Wednesday only got a sorry about the problem in the comments, and here we are on Thursday still being frustrated in having this sorted out. 
It's become a sort of pointer as to what other Global Payment potential customers can expect.
Money into my bank account TODAY G.P. or I'll keep updating this review on a daily basis. OR DON'T YOU CARE?
-------------------------------------------------------------
27/10/23
Well, my posting back here sort of answers my question, doesn't it. They don't seem to give a hit.
I've now cancelled my Direct Debit.
Let's see if that encourages a response
-------------------------------------------------------------
29/10/23
I see a payment has now gone into my bank, however it's not exactly the right amount. It's £4.26 short. As well as that I was also promised a return of last months fees of £42.44, as I have been denied the use of my terminal for most of that period due them sending the wrong one.
You're nearly there, Global Payments, but not quite.
-----------------------------------------------------------
4/11/23
Surprise, surprise. Despite the promises of no account charges for 3 months, and a return of the last month's fees, nothing has been received back as yet. 
Today I had another invoice notification for charges for the period to end of October.
This is really beyond a joke.
C'mon Global Payments. What in God's name are you doing????
P.S. I will edit this post for every new problem encountered, or promise that remains unfulfilled until such time as absolutely everything is sorted out to my satisfaction.
----------------------------------------------------------
9/12/2023
I received a monthly charges invoice despite them telling me that the next 3 months would be free. I had already cancelled the direct debit as I suspected this would happen, so they couldn't take payment from my bank.
However they paid over an amount equal to a sale amount less the monthly charge fee. It's only £30 but every penny counts, eh? So they have reneged on the promise of 3 months free charges.
This company is the absolute pits.

Three days after I applied, I received the device on Friday, completed the activation process, charged the device and started using the device in the Market the next day.
I regret to say that it was an extremely negative experience for me.
First of all, I couldn't pair the device with my phone for a long time, then I couldn't find an explanation even though I checked it on the internet, and after I checked the device myself and turned on a hot spot on my phone, I created a new Wifi connection on the device and established the connection. (After a day, I was able to connect without even needing wifi) Then I made the first payment process successfully, but I noticed that the battery of the device was halved even though I fully charged the device the night before. was not happening.
By the way, I discovered through my own efforts that when the device goes into sleep mode after a while, the connection with the phone is lost and I have to close the application on my phone and restart it to connect again, and at the same time, long press the green button on the device.
In an environment with high customer traffic, it takes a long time for the device to say whether the payment has been confirmed. In fact, a minute later, I noticed that a customer's payment was not confirmed, and I asked the customer to follow up and repeat the transaction. Unfortunately, I missed another customer's payment.

Unfortunately, a few of my customers gave up on purchasing due to situations such as checking the charging status of the card reader device, trying to connect the reader to the phone many times in order to receive payment in the market environment.

I was using Sum Up before and the charge of that card reader lasts up to a few weeks, it connects to the phone via bluetooth and goes into sleep mode by itself, and when the process is finished, it becomes active at the same speed.

I am extremely grateful to Account Executive Mr. Paul Emery, who gave me very fast and detailed information and help, but I would like to express with regret that I would like to cancel my membership due to the poor performance of the card reader device, although all member merchant portal and other software parties are very good.

After several days, several long telephone calls, and a lot of hard work, my card reader from Global Payments still failed to work at all.  I have given up.

Two tried hard to work with me, and each got as far as deciding the problem was beyond their capability to solve, and passed it on to others in your organisation ("the guys who earn the big bucks"!).  Sending the error report from my machine produced the response that the problem should now be solved; it wasn't. On Saturday the 10th all three of our card machines went down and resulted in them not working at all, we contacted the helpdesk at approx 11.40pm in hopes that they would be able to resolve this. The Manager tried to ring several times they gave him the out of hours number on the first phone call and there was no answer, and no phone call back, as you can imagine on a busy weekend this was very frustrating as is costing the business money. The manager then tried ringing several times on Sunday with no answer from the help desk again. The admin then tried calling all of Monday from 10am and eventually got through at 3.30pm, in which they have said all three machines are needing to be replaced as they all share the same Terminal ID number which isn't correct as they need to have their own. Which is not a fault of ours. They also said that the SIM cards in two of the machines have been retired meaning they won't connect to 3G signal again causing issues as we did not request for those SIM's to be retired. Looking over our taking for this weekend compared to last there is big difference. Been with Global Payments for several years. The first I was aware of a problem was when our batch settlements stopped going into our business account. I phoned last week to see what the problem was and have been waiting on someone getting back to us. On the 11th of April I received a letter (dated 31st of March) saying that they had been trying to reach us by phone unsuccessfully. I'm not sure what number they've been trying to reach us on but its not our number. The letter states that they have identified that they need extra security to cover the risk associated with continuing to provide card processing services to us as per clause 19 of our contract. There is no reason to explain why we've been considered a risk. All transactions have been processed through their 3Dv2 security checks where liability is with the bank.

So they have been holding back around £20,000 of our funds since the 31st of March, (which is the same date as the letter they have sent with no letters prior to that). 2 weeks later and I'm still trying to find out what has happened to our £20k. This has caused significant business disruption to my very small family businesses, so will be changing to a new card provider at the earliest opportunity.

I have been with Global payments for 2 years and I have three major points here. Firstly they automatically renew your contract without notice which means you are not allowed to leave for the next 12 months without paying excessive charges.

Secondly the rates for the fees are changed again without notice or warning. So you really have to keep an eye on your statements EVERY single month and a business owner thats a rediculous thing to ask.

Lastly the most rediculous thing is even if you cancel the contract within the allocated time frame, they charge you a rediculous fee of £75 + VAT for collecting the terminal!!

Point is avoid these scammers.
