My experience with Global payments company team member James was excellent.
He explained very clearly how he can help to reduce my costs saving at least £500 in a year after agreeing another yearly contract and offering next day payments free of charge.
James also compared my other offer from Fresha explaining the difference in rates per transaction.Very pleased with his efficiency and help during my inquiry. 10 out of 10 😊

The service from Pooja last year and David this year in renewals has been efficient and got the job done professionally 
Many thanks

I dealt with Bhav at Global Payments.
Fantastic chap to deal with. Works with you to get the best deal. Highly recommend!!

James was brilliant. 
Very easy to deal with. 
Everything was resolved. 
Can highly recommend.

Bhav Parmar was very professional with helping our Company change some charges on our account would recommend as speak to hil again.
Thank You

From start to finish the experience received from Bhav was outstanding, it was a pleasure to deal with him regarding the update of our terms and our machine too. 

Thank you again for your help Bhav and would recommend anyone needing to adjust terms or upgrade their machine to speak to Bhav who will ensure things are as smooth and pain free as possible!
excellent service and very detailed

I have had a seamless experience dealing with Global Payments Uk. Paul helped and guided me through the process and I felt supported and able to ask questions with ease. I was encouraged to contact him for support throughout the process. Thank you very much. Highly recommend.

Many thanks to Global payments and our contact Elizabeth Wilson. We were organising a charity event and our bank let us down at the last minute re chip & pin readers. Elizabeth quickly organised our application and the readers were received in plenty of time for our successful event. She has been really helpful throughout the whole process.

The card terminal was very easy to fix and had fast payments. Mr Milton Saha's customer service was great as he from time to time was asking if everything is okay and guided us to fix the card terminal as quickly as possible.
We are very happy and highly recommend 

Thank you, Mr Saha,
Finally I found a very good card machine. Thanks to Mr Hasan. 🙏
James Cherry should be promoted.  He is extremly polite, comes back to you asap.  Listen and understands you questions and will get you answers if he cannot.  Commendable employee
Excellent service

I called Global Payments and was assisted by Azizi, Azizi guided me in the right direction and resolved our issue in a timely, satisfactory and professional manner.
So much so, we did not even compare rates with competitors as the service level is extremely important to ourselves.

Milton is an expert in his field very friendly very helpful he has brought great value to my buiness with the advice and services he has offered.

Thank you Milton
Dealt with Azizi the very first time, he we very professional and extremely helpful. Resolved the problem within hours. Very happy with the service.
Thibahar has been very helpful and professional. Many thanks!

I had an excellent experience with Global Payments today. Often these large companies are faceless organisations. I dealt with a very helpful and efficient chap called Bhav Parmar who did exactly what he said he would. He even called me back as a follow on from the email me sent me. Excellent service. Thank you.
Azizi is a star! He is a huge credit to your team, you’re lucky to have him.

Thank you Milton for helping me for End of the day banking issues & your time to visit us. Always 5 ⭐️ Services. 
Thank you From E4 Tyres

I took some extra time to absorb their services. Now I’m happy to share my experience. First of all, account manager Abu approached me. I like his offer. This is the best card machine company I ever had. Thanks Abu and Globalpayments.
Good service
my global consultantant bab was extremely helpful and i will recommend him to my business associates

Following a little complacency on my part and having been approached by several card processing 3rd party providers who offered considerably better terms, I considered leaving Global after many years with them. I contacted James Boyne from Global's Renewal Dept and was very impressed with his attitude, professionalism and speedy response. He not only matched my best quote but actually bettered  some of it. My only negative comment is that when I asked to close the account, Global didn't even try to ask why or contact me to see if they could save the business. It took my call to David to resolve the matter. Ultimately very happy though.

Stephen Lovie was recommended to my by a friend. We were looking for a card machine for our new community cafe. Timelines were tight and it wasnt straight forward. However Stephen was there anytime we needed him
Day or night. He has been the sleekest person we have worked with in the whole process of the cafe. Thanks so much for all his help. Couldn’t open without his help.

We were working with James Cherry in relation to the renewal of our card payment processing.  We have a small turnover compared to many other businesses and James was able to ensure that our renewal process went smoothly and was beneficial to our business for which we are grateful.

Excellent service from start to finish , geoff was very helpful and saved me a signicant amount on my monthly card transactions! highly recommmed!
Coconut Tree
Good customer service from the rep

Since I did join Global Payments, Mr Milton Saha always my first point to help any issues. Excellent personality & kind manner. I like next day funding & one point service. No third party involved in my service. Recommending all restaurants owner to contract Milton Saha.
Nas has been a brilliant help in pushing through changes for clients.

We have been with Global payments for many years now, a great company for all of our payment needs. Our account manager Rita Majithia is always quick to respond and carefully handles all issues and queries when the arrive. With a competitive market space and so many cold callers for alternative providers Global payments is our only choice. Safe, secure and personal.

David was very helpful. He responded to my request very quickly with the right solution.
And he was available when i needed help.

I worked with Beth Williams as a dedicated manager for setting up our business payment methods. 
From discussing fees to signing contracts and bringing the system live was a very quick and smooth process. 
Very good experience!

Thibahar was very helpful in getting things up and running after receiving a generic error and having little details about the transaction for me to provide, and we were able to sort things out the same day.
The service received from Kartar Ryatt was excellent with proper illustrations of all savings and costs at the time of application. Highly Recommended

When it became clear we needed to change our merchant services provider we reached out to Global Payments.  Jo Warner was tasked with dealing with my company.  She was incredibly quick to respond and produce a quotation.  The quote appeared to be very competitive, so we decided to proceed.  Again, Jo was very speedy in getting all the required documentation to me and subtly reminded me if I had overlooked anything.  Top class service from Jo!
Thibahar assisted quickly and diligently. Identifying our configuration issue and resolving within a very short period of time. We appreciate their support
Bhav was very friendly and helpful,save me a lot of money,the service was amazing.

I was looking to change supplier and spoke with James Cherry who was very quickly and efficiently able to offer better terms and convince me to stay with Global Payments.  His ability to make things happen within a short space of time rescued an otherwise lost client.
Very happy with you
Polite and efficient service from Bhav

Excellent customer service from Bhav who managed the process from start to finish.  Negotiated the rates with me then sent me a follow up email confirming the discussion that we agreed.  Super professional service.
Excellent service

Card payment machine not functioning, contacted the sales person who sold me the machine.  Contact no. Given by him also on paperwork nobody can find my account or the type of machine I was sold spoke with 3 people all the same comments.  Emailed the sales person no reply .  Not been able to use machine as unreliable have gone to another company

Top man Mr Hyder ...
Absolutely brilliant service from him .
No  hidden charges all are transparent. 

Highly recommended to use global payments card processing system.

Very impressed by David in the Commercial and Retentions team. In general my interaction with Global Payments UK can be frustrating, any interaction takes a long time and the agent is not equipped to help, even with simple tasks. However, David was wonderful. He was assisted immediately, followed up same day and within a few days my request was actioned. 
Was a delight dealing with David - thank you.
Great experince talking with Bhav Parmar and helping me with reducing my rates.
Good service but charge is lit bit high 👌
We were in need of some card machines for our Farmaggedon event and Global provided both the information and machines right on time. Very helpful and great service, thank you!

Bhav...stopped me in my tracks....!!

Rates sorted...No Problem....
Cut down by over £k+/annum

Pick the phone...call them for a revue on your rates...

Mark
School Farm Shop
Excellent customer service, fast and easy setup. I would highly recommend. :)
Thanks to Maheer Majid for swift responses and updates and getting us up and running in a timely manner to meet our web launch deadlines.
Thank you David
Very easy process.  Staff very helpful.

Got a credit card terminal supplied be john Moore of global payments 
Very efficient service 
Would highly recommend

We have been a customer of Global Payments for a number of years and have been very satisfied. We know needed a different type of machine and david in renewals has given us excellent service and advice, responding to emails very promptly and efficiently.
Highly recommend them.
I asked for a review of our current charges and my request was dealt with promptly and efficiently
Bhav dealt with the issue swiftly and effectively on a small time scale

I had recently had dealings with Azizi Arthur,
Customer Success Team, Commercial & Retentions, his service has been amazing.  I can highly recommend Global Payments.

We have just moved to Global Payments UK Ltd. The whole experience has been seamless from start to finish.
Beth Williams our Business manager has been fantastic all through the process. She has set up every one of the 70 machines we required. We literally had to just plug them in and they operated from the outset.
Excellent customer service so far.
Sarita Parmar very helpful. Always good back up if help required .

I have been working with Nas over several weeks to get all of our customers moved over to 3DSv2 payment processing. He has been extremely helpful, efficient and reliable and has always kept our appointments and gone the extra mile.

As a group of companies we have been using Global Payments for 6+ years and never had any issues. Recently I requested new facilities for two additional companies and as expected, Andy Flint was exceptional at making sure everything was in order.

Communication from the entire team is always on point. Plus their team understand that we are all busy people, so they politely keep chasing for answers to make sure our business has the facilities it needs.

Good company to work 
Global is a good company and Pira is very helpful.
I have sign up my second shop with global

Mead news
Excellent service and a pleasure to deal with. Thank you
Vishali Jasata is absolutely brilliant at her job the entire process was made so less complicated, such clear guidance and advice it been such a stress free application thank you Vishali
Dipesh Morjaria was very good and helpful . Excellent .

Elizabeth Wilson has been supportive and informative since our company's first contact with her. Any query has been dealt with speedily and reported back with useful information. I would recommend Elizabeth to anyone looking to discuss card payment options.
A fantastic and reliable service. No complications and very quick. Majid was great and kept me informed at every stage. Thank you
The customer service agent I dealt with was great, a credit to his company. If thee is any bonus system in place for customer service this gentleman should qualify
I communicated with David, very helpful, helped us settle our case quickly.
Excellent service from Ilyas
Azizi was really helpful and supportive throughout our communication.  He made sure that we had access to everything that we needed and all his correspondence was swift and clear.  Highly recommend!
Fast and best service.
Vishali was excellent from start to finish! Made it a really easy process and ensured we had the complete information. Highly recommend.

Service from our Area Manager, Ilyas is always excellent. Very responsive to communication from us when we need to get hold of him, and generally very helpful. Although they are competitive, Global Payments might not be the cheapest option, but in terms of service, I would recommend them very highly.
Efficient, set up completed. Stephen was great, kept us up to date with progress throughout the process. Would highly recommend.

Globalpayment is an amazing company with excellent people 

I am a customer of Globalpayment for more than one year and  enjoying their services . Pira is  handling my account and always available for any queries.

Londis
Thank you Mobu Miah (Sales Account Manager) and Ingenico Terminal Support Team for your guide and support to use the terminal.

Knowledge , guidance about service Milton always help us.  Fantastic man I am working with, any issue he is resolving very quick. Recently I got money clearance issue, he assured me & resolved. Global got right man to serve right place. Thank you

Mr Milton Saha is one of the finest person I met last year who introduced me Global Payments card processing system. He always help me whenever I need. I will recommend all high street business man to use Mr Milton service & Global Payments. 5* deserved ..⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I didn’t realize that my account had been out of contract, so I regularly received updated higher and higher rates since 2020. 

I called the customer service yesterday about my concern. Mr James Cherry patiently and friendly explained everything in detail and gave me a satisfied proposal taking effect soon. 

I have been very happy for meeting James Cherry who is trustworthy for his recommendations and explanations. Thank you very much.

We are so happy for Arif who help us whenever we needed with professional manner
We are Very happy with Global payments 
for our Business. Best payment solutions provider in the market.

Mr Khan is a awesome in terms of switching procedure 👍👍👍
Provided Great service and very professional and transparent .

Highly recommend 👍👍👍
We asked for a rate review and it was completed promptly and professionally
Thibahar was great in resolving the case we had in a swift manner

Worst company for accepting card payments. They charge totally different from what is offered on the contract. Raised this with customer services & the line manager for sales person, no response. Offering me email address for Financial ombudsman now to contact them directly. As they are not able to resolve this. Offered refund for the incorrect charges applied to the account, which never came through. Waited for 2-3 months now.

Follow up on my previous review. After a public promise to get in contact and rectify the issue, once again Global Payments has withheld a massive amount of money from our account, completely unjustified.
This company is dangerous to trust.
We are having to make numerous calls to rectify the human errors they have made and the only portal we get is a lowly call centre agent that cannot help nor offer a solution.

Global Payments owes us big amount of money which they are refusing to release.

Consider very seriously before you trust this company!

To Global payments - contact us and release our funds immediately!
Rita was extremely helpful and got my issues sorted

Global payments - I spoke to Bhav Parmar who was quick to respond and provided me with a clear comparison of what we were currently paying and the new fees. When we signed the paperwork he dealt with the changes quickly and efficiently

Thibahar has been very helpful throughout the process of trying to get our technical problem solved, simplifying some of the 'tech' language and also speaking with me on the phone when it was easier to explain things that way. I'm very grateful for his help in resolving this issue.

Majid, was so helpful and understanding, specifically in my personnel situation.  I'm so excited too have this Global Payments machine to take payments is going to make life so much easier with clients.  Majid answered every question swiftly and got back to me updating me every step of the way.  Thank you Majid.
Excellent service. Mr. Ariful Islam help us to activate our terminal and explain everything very friendly way. We are so happy 😊 for Ariful service and his professional behavior.

We've been signed up for a year now and we're still waiting for the card terminal that was sold to us - I'm pretty sure that this is classed as miss selling as we've been lumbered with a sub quality product that we've been paying the same monthly fees for.

The original sale rep that signed us into the deal (Solomon Shahatit) completely ignores all lines of communication including emails, calls and voicemail. We have already called customer services and logged a complaint - upon doing so the complaints team assigned us to another of Solomons colleagues (ollie burr) who also feels the need to ignore all forms of correspondence.

Firstly; If anyone manages to get lumbered with either of these two, then run a mile - in the meantime I'm hoping that Global Payments decide to rectify this issue before our contract ends.
very bad, not responding to any emails

James Cherry of Global Payments really helped cut through the 'bigness and complexity' of Global Payments in order to retain my company as a customer  and quickly to sort out the bureaucracy and paperwork to reduce our transaction costs and to supply our new card readers.
'Bhav Parmar' is great.

Very expensive service. They made me pay the card machine every month and after 6 years when I decided to work with another supplier I had to pay £90 for the collection of the card machine and 2 months later they discreetly took £318 from my bank account (no invoice, nothing) for the bloody old card machine they never collected.
I am furious, I really feel cheated, I spend more than £2000 on this card machine, it is ridiculous but they make things so complicated that I didn't realise they were just pumping money from me with fix charges like the card machine. Don't trust them. They charge a lot for nothing, my new supplier IS CHARGING HALF THE PRICE.
And of course Emma never contacted me.

Thank you 
James Cherry for the good customer service approach!
Ollie Burr of Global Payments - knowledgeable, helpful, charming and very patient. Thank you. FHME.

James was extremely quick in dealing with my request. He asked all the correct questions and the matter was resolved completely to my satisfaction. Global Payments are a large corporate entity but have managed to keep the personal touches associated with a much smaller business.

Excellent customer service by Pira at Globalpayments

Pira at Globalpayments is very professional and always available on the line.  i am enjoying excellent service from Global Payment and highly recommend for businesses,
Beechwood News & Convenience Store

Alex Taheri our account Manager has been excellent, especially over the past couple of months where we have encountered several changes to our businesses requirements with Global - really helpful and quick to respond too!!

Charles Pugh (Glass) Limited
Great customer service from Elisabeth Wilson again, dealt with my enquiry promptly and professionally. Always willing to help and is a credit to Global Payments Thanks again Rob and Lisa.

Top service from Andy Flint. Very helpful and explained all of the pricing to me. Would recommend to anyone wishing to accept cards as a method of payments. We use them for online, click & collect and face to face.

The service I received from Dipesh at Global Payments on setting our new credit card payments account up was nice & simple with help on hand if needed. Its the most secure way to take any credit card payments with any credit cards and funds are in your bank account next day.

My contact was with BHAV who was very professional throughout my renewal process. He was informative, knowledgeable, precise to the point and it was a real pleasure to actually talk to a person so helpful and understanding. 
Thank you.
Suzy

We've been with them for 5 years now and I have to say that the experience has been 5 stars. No issues, responsive support and an excellent account manager Bhav Parmar who has always been on our side, getting better rates year on year.
Account set up quickly and efficiently - thanks to Mobu for his help.

We are so happy with GLOBAL PAYMENTS,  also very happy with Arif who are helping us whenever we need, like PCI, merchants portal etc. 
I will recommend global  payments to others as well as
Bhav Parmar is always a pleasure to deal with.  No fuss and gets the job done.  Thanks.
Friendly and professional.
Bhav was very informative, helpful and had a very pleasant telephone manner.
great customer service by Bhav Parmar he has looked after our account for a few years and has always got us the best deal.
A speedily handled renewal.
Bhav was an excellent representative of the company, arranged our new account parameters with great explanation.

*Globalpayments is an excellent company and Pira is very Professinal and helpful, and always available for any queries.

Niboshan  Diya Stores
Great customer service from Azizi Arthur again, dealt with my enquiry promptly and professionally.

Very good service very helpful 
Arif

We found the process of switching to Global Payments a lot easier than we thought! 
They wanted to understand our business so they could ensure we would get the correct service that best suited our style of trading. We received a good explanation of our options and the current styles of taking payments. Dipesh (Morjaria) was knowledgeable and helpful throughout. He kept us informed and was easy to contact and deal with.

Our Senior Business Manager (James Clegg) has been on hand and very supportive offering advice and assisting with the set up and registering of MID's and other business critical tasks.

We would definitely recommend using Global Pay and even more so recommend James a Business Manager.
Always dealt with Dave and been given excellent service. Makes contact before renewal is due and gives the best offer and advice for anything we need. Always helpful and easy to deal with.

I have been with barclaycard for over 10 years and have had my current terminal for around 6 years.

Had no idea what I was paying or that I can get a terminal that connects to WiFi and Mobile signal at the same time

Ikhlas Alvi explained everything about my current rates and also which terminal I can upgrade to, I am pleased to say I'm taking payment a lot faster and saving money plus next day crediting..!!

I've had previous experience with Mr Ikhlas Alvi at another one of my businesses and he hasn't disappointed once again

Everything is handled with courtesy and professionally

Thank You
James has always been available and supportive throughout our time with GlobalPayments - highly recommend.
Kevin was very efficient and made everything really simple and quick.
Thankyou for taking your time to listen , understand and advice us how to move forward.

Mr. James Cherry is very good at his work and very kind for his customer. 
I got my good offer from his excellent service.

I had really good experience with Global payments as there are very dedicated and willingness.  Mostly I deal with Milton saha regarding payment processing,  invoice issues as sometimes I had trouble logging into online so they sorted out soon as also support me on completing PCI Compliance .
I really appreciate their helpfulness at all the times.
Milton is a very helpful person. His service is very fast and effective
Great 👍 👍👍Milton Saha
Milton is handling our Global Payments account for past three yeras and all the time his services have been excellent, professional and prompt. I can easily recommend him to anyboby.

We have been experiencing an issue with Payments relating to American Express which has been ongoing for over 6 months. Noone at GlobalPay has been able to resolve the amtter and merely pass us back to AMEX.
Vishali at Global payments was extremely professional, helpful and informative through out the process of helping me set up my account with Global.
Easy to use, communicate very well.
Easy to install  ie just plug in and very quick processing transactions

Ive been dealing with Majid Maheer. From the start, the service provided has been brilliant. 
Due to unfortunate circumatances, i had to cancel my contract. But even though im cancelling, he has been responding to my emails and sorting things for me.  Very helpful and honest.
amazing service amazing response i really appreciate.

Been using Global Payments for a while now. Contacted the renewals team with some concerns before extending the contract. The response was professional and persistent, clearly understood my concerns and wanted our business. Thanks to the assistance of James Cherry from the renewals team I signed for another year.
We dealt with David who was prompt with his communication and the service overall was excellent.

consumer.displayName: Performance Toys Ltd TA Storm Buggies

text:
John Moore - Account Manager
What a fantastic experience working with John. He is very knowledgeable about the industry and has made my job a lot easier by explaining what I need to do and without industry jargon. He has always been willing to go that extra mile to help with any queries and never let us down in securing resolutions to any issues we have had. It has been great working with him.

I needed to review our Global Payments agreement and had the whole process dealt with by James Cherry. All extremely smooth and seamless. Prompt responses to emails and all processes dealt with effeciently.

I'm rating our account manager, John Moore, as five star. He's brilliant. Always helpful and on hand to guide us through anything.

It is a shame that the central GP team isn't as good and creates more work for us as customers! If it wasn't for John, we might well look elsewhere for our merchant card services.
Thank you to John Moore for great service and promptly answering my queries.
Working fine

Excellent Service - Next Day Deposit - Remarkable staff & my account manager. Simply Brilliant 

Usama Siddique - Owner Meat & Shake - Tooting - London
Quite long winded and not totally clear what was required from me.
Thanks Hasan for advising the perfect solution for our business which has speed up the service and we’re really happy!!
Global Payments worked with us to reduce the rates on our card tranactions and the service and results were amazing.

It was a great pleasure working with Stephen Lovie, his response time to my questions and queries before getting the card machine was very quick. Once I received the machine he was there to help me set it up. There is no doubt I would recommend Global Payments UK to anyone else.

We had been experiencing a number of problems with our inter-grated PDQ terminals at our store. The terminals had been supplied to us by our till provider, who was unable to supply us anything but a sim connection terminal. Unfortunately although it did help a bit our signal is very weak so found they dropped off easily. 
We contacted Rob Mashuk regarding some temporary terminals to use until ours get repaired. Upon promptly receiving the global payments machines Rob was on hand and extremely efficient at helpfully guiding me through the set up of them and thankfully now we can operate our store with two fully functioning tills that wont drop out of signal.
FANTASTIC!

Amazing Service Rob has talked us through everything with time and also gave us a chance to ask questions.

Excellent service , We are really happy clients

I needed a quick efficient and value for money card merchant services. Having been in touch with the global payments Uk sales executive Bhav Parmar . This is exactly what I got and would highly recommend him to anyone with similar needs.

Bhav managed to get me some new (much improved) rates over very quickly. Disappointed that there was no power to backdate or compensate though considering we have been paying two very different rates for two terminals under the same roof for years.

zero customer care. They dont have any idea of what they do, just reading made up letters not listening.
We pay for zero service.
Changed made without our consent and we had to call and stay on the line ages while each operator once gets tired of our questions pretends to not to hear and the line magically drops. SAD sad non professional team. Feel free to contact me for evidences and all the data i can't publish here, including the ID that i have been asked to remove.

We have been using Global Payments UK for the past few years. we are very happy with the service they provide and the account manager Elisabeth Wilson has been taking care of us very well since we joined. The transaction fee is very low.

We highly recommend to use Global Payments UK, small or large business

Amazing customer service, very low transaction fees. The Account / Territory Manager Elisabeth Wilson is the best took care of everything for us.

I highly recommend using global payment UK for card payment system for small or large business.

I recently moved to Global Payments.

Dipesh Morjaria Handled the whole process and I can only describe his level of customer service as outstanding.

I can highly recommend Dipesh and Global Payments.

I have had five star service and technical support from Elisabeth Wilson. She has been a continuous support to me setting up my card machines, enabling me to understand and fix issues with my card machines, guiding me through gaining compliance and other general issues. At a crucial and busy time for my business Elisabeth helped to reduce any stress linked to technical support. I would definitely recommend this company and would recommend working with Elisabeth. Thank you.

We needed a mobile terminal instead of the fixed one originally sent and Elaine dealt with my request very efficiently and promptly and a replacement terminal was sent and the old one returned. I was very satisfied with the service received thank you especially with my correspondence by email with Elaine.
James Cherry was very helpful and knowledgable

We had some changes to make in terms of accounts and company / director names - plus also had a query about renewal rates.  The service provided via email from Emily was great - with all questions answered promptly and a really good rate negotiated for our ongoing contract.

My experience with Global Payments has been very positive.  There have been a couple of instances where customer services have been unable to help this year.  This is where our fantastic account manager Ilyas has stepped in and moved things along for us.  He is the reason for the 5/5 stars.  Very polite, attentive and is a genuinely helpful person.
Quick review and a good rate.
Brilliant service, great advice given and fantastic price for renewal. Special thanks to James Cherry for his service.

Great service from John Moore.
We have worked with John previously to get a new product arranged and were fully supported throughout the process. Upon deciding to implement this product in another of our companies I didn't hesitate to reach out to John again. His communications are always prompt and clear to understand and he's always willing to support me with any questions or queries I have, and do so in a timely fashion. Super service.

I applied for a card reader, went through a fifteen-minute telephone conversation, and was told that I would receive a confirmation email and a call from someone to collect the payment for the reader, I received absolutely nothing from them. I emailed to ask what was happening, but again, no reply. I then went on to Zettle website, got registered in about five minutes, and received the card reader the next day - so don't bother with this useless bunch, choose a professional company.

Excellent service from Bhav Parmar.
Explained everything to me clearly and was happy to answer my huge list of questions! Friendly and knowledgeable, a real credit to the company.
I've worked with Rita Majithia many times now and she's always really supportive and efficient with helping me out or pointing me in the right direction, I can't fault her work.

Great service from maheer Majid
Kept me Informed all through the process couldn't ask for more

Very difficult to talk to the global payment 
Customer service it very annoying

Have had little help from major banks setting up card processing to suite our needs but Mobu Miah from Global Payments could not have been more helpful.  He was patient though I'm hopeless at these things & gave me confidence having a real person to talk to.  Nothing was too much trouble, thank you Mo.
Roy Dabasish was very helpful and attentive in setting things up for us. Seamless throughout and a great system.

The service provided for our multi unit hospitality group has been nothing short of fantastic
Stephen Lovie has been first class and even provided assistance while recovering from an operation.

I have to say Maheer Majid (Maj) Account Executive at Global Payments Has been extemporary. He made the process incredibly simple. He listened and assessed are needs and Was able to find a product that fitted perfectly. His communication was great he did exactly what he said and even helped us negotiate some better rates. I will hundred percent recommend global payments and especially Mahir.
When renewing our service agreement, Bhav was efficient and approachable. Bhav provided fast responses and worked hard to get the deal right for us.

Jo Warner is incredibly helpful, quick to respond and provide solutions for every issue! 

Jo has helped me massively over the last 8 months whilst we have been opening new sites!

Thank you!!

Dealing with Bhav Parmar from Global Payments was an absolute pleasure. He listened to our needs and came back quickly with competitive quote. If you are sitting on the fence about moving over to Global Payments then don’t delay.
I can’t recommend them highly enough and the service received from Bhav Parmar was exemplary.
Elisabeth Wilson was very helpful and pleasant and was able to sort out any teething problems we had. All telephone and email enquiry's were answered promptly.

Excellent customer service.
I can not thank Bhav enough for his help with a recent problem with my PDQ. 
Bhav went that extra mile to help resolve the problem his professional approach & willingness to help are second to none.
He is a great asset to his company.
Thank you Bhav.

I have used global payment card machines and I cancelled my membership. They had very bad services and they did not transfered my transactions 4 days! Due to cancellation I have paid 420£ penalty and I have posted their card machines. But still they are creating problem!! Still they are charging me 20£ per months. I have cancelled my direct debit and send them e mail many times! I called them as well but they are ignoring to solve this problem. Only they are sending letter and treating me to charge extra penalty!! All I suggest to people that they should not use this company services or machines!! I never seen like this company!!!
Opening the Global Payment account is so smoothly with Mobu helping, great personal service, very much appreciate.

We recently moved over to Global Payments and so far they have been nothing but great, particularly our Business Manager Andy Flint. Andy came in and understood the business we ran and how this could be improved with Global's system - as well as saving us money!

Previously we would take telephone orders and later process them and ring through our 1 physical card terminal. This new system enables the staff to be able to process the order at the time of taking, because they are then all able to use the virtual terminal online to process their card payments.

We now use Global as our website payment gateway too, which has been great to be able to have all our payments now under one roof (previously Opayo).

We are very rural and occasionally have serious problems losing internet or power, and the new terminals have the function to use the built in sim card so we are still able to take payments.

So far our experience has been brilliant and we are very happy :)

After that i was told that they manually did the end of day process for me for so long because i did not do it and they stopped doing that after the 2nd july 2020. So they asked for receipts that i unfortunately did not have and hencewhy they did not do a thing. I raised it with their supervisor and was rudely got back. I could sense it that they are not going to return my money and the did not. I lost £1500 just after i had reopened my shop after lockdown. 
Simple question. 
If you did my end of day manually from 22oct to 1st july, what happened suddenly that you stopped doing it and also did not call me once and tell me or teach me the process??

I am employed by a London Local Council, I required 2 merchant numbers to be set up urgently. My Global Payments Sales Executive-Azizi Arthur was extremely professional, knowledgeable and polite. He kept me informed throughout with updates on progress and was able to set up the required merchant numbers very promptly. I very much appreciated all his assistance.

I have set up a new business in the UK and the leasing agreement for my hotel moved very fast which meant I need a credit card machine vendor to collect payments. Immediately went online and started writing to different vendors. That's where I came across global pay and Dipesh. Since the start, Dipesh was very transparent, clear, and honest about what is possible and not. He explained me the overall charges and I gave give him a very difficult task of arranging the machine in two days. I am using global pay for the past few weeks and I am very satisfied with their overall service, an online app that provides daily, weekly, yearly sales for me to be on top of all my payments. I get my money next day in my account which is very rare with most companies. Dipesh and Global Pay I would surely recommend to anyone.

Found the process of integrating Global Payment in to the day to day operation of the business quick and seamless. Expertly guided through the process by Ilyas Elahi whom I found to be extremely helpful and pleasure to deal with. 

Thank you again Ilyas and the Global Team..

warning .. do not get involved with this company , they use a company called security metrics  who make sure that you are compliant when you use your card payment terminal , global payments and security metrics are both based in the USA. every 12 months they call to go through the proceedure to make you compliant, so normal charge is around £26 a month , if your not,compliant they take £99.50 a month  last year , march 2020 they contacted me to do the compliant proceedure, they said theyd make contact this year , when i checked the bank statements, theyd continued to charge me for non compliance for 4 months ,so they owe me almost £300. i recently changed to another card terminal company who are brilliant, all this compliance yarn is done by them, today i recieved a threatning letter from global payments for £73 that im suposed to owe them , when i finally contacted them and spent an hour and a half on the phone .they made every possible excuse to validate the payment even though they owe me, needless to say ,they wasnt interested and said theyd recover the £73 through a debt recovery company , so i paid it  , so be warned and stay well clear of this company, scamming bunch of scum                               update... still waiting for a call back to resolve this matter , most probable the same as everyone else who are waiting to be called or messaged back , it doesnt happen !
Great service and an account manager providing expert support.

Couldn't fault Global payments UK's service, from the initial email enquiry to the installation of three new terminals, the service has been perfect! Azizi Arthur has been outstanding throughout, very helpful and always available on email or the phone to help out and advising on progress.

We have enjoyed a great relationship with Global payments for some years now and we haven’t been the easiest customers!  Ilyas Elahi always helps us find a solution and has a great ‘can do’ attitude. The rates are fair and competitive. Highly recommend

Many thanks to Azizi Arthur helping me to close one account and open another.  Azizi guided me through from start to finish and I was so pleased to be assigned just one person to deal with the whole process. Azizi is always fast and reliable with replies to any questions I have.
For business send money buy car
Keep me P A on the phone for over 45 min  ,in the end she put the phone  down totally  unacceptable
Scammers never recommend to anyone

From my first enquiry to getting all set up was totally painless. Azizi  Arthur was so helpful with the initial call and left all the information I needed with me to make a decision in my own time.  Once we had decided to use Global Payments UK as our card processing partner the rest of the process was so easy.  The equipment came within days and was so easy to set up.  One of the main selling points on our behalf was the fact that you get a personal account manager who you can contact directly and who can deal with any issues you may have.  We would certainly recommend Global Payments as a card provider.

Shocking practice.  Have been charging us fees for non-compliance when we always were.  5 pages of fee charges for a small eCommerce business!!  Overly complicated details with of course hidden charges, that's why.

It's a dated dinosaur of a company that has been easily overtaken but the newcomers, who have shaken up the industry and made life so simple.  What's out there now makes these guys look like you're still using pen and paper.

Global payments will hold your money without consent. Their transaction fees are very high and there is no loyalty with long standing customers. We will be looking to take legal action against Global Payments

Top class thievery from Global.  Called in February as noticed I was being charged for no transactions, and not being PCI compliant (when I contacted them months ago to sort it out) Was advised that I would not be charged that amount, however, I changed to DOJO as the service from Inspire and Global is shocking.  Received a demand letter today for £95 from March?  Called up and they literally don't understand simple logic.

Be wary of any card terminal company that outsources payments to others, and also ties you in for more than a month.  There is absolutely no need anymore for this, as other companies are a monthly rolling business, and I have to say are far more helpful because of it.  All queries sorted out in seconds, PCI done on the terminal, and customer service staff who want to sort out your issue there and then. 

I don't see any benefit in companies like Inspire or Global anymore as their model is outdated, and doesn't benefit customers.

PS - if you are going to put your name to a demand letter, ensure the grammar is correct, and you have actually sent someone a CORRECT invoice.  It makes you look incompetent, especially when your CS advisor says that a customer has to REQUEST it, meaning we have never received it!

Renewed the PCI compliance on time but because we didn't answer the few questions required after making the payment (we were unaware we had to do this), Global Payments said we were non compliant. We hadn't noticed that they had been charging us £75 non compliant fee on each of our two accounts for months and months! Fees now amount to over £600! Wrote in a complaint and was told I'd have a response with 5 days. Still waiting to hear from them!
It was very helpful and nicely been talking on the phone.

Absolutely disgusting service!  I have a card reader with Retail Merchant Services and Global Payments are the receiving bank.  Just before we were due to reopen on 17 May, I discovered that Global payments had closed my account because I owed them £15.08.  They refused to reactivate it because it was out the 6 month "grace" period by 2 weeks.  The only solution was to set up a new merchant ID account.  I got my MID at 4:57pm on Weds (2nd June) and was told all I needed to do was give RMS a ring to activate the new MID with my card machine.  Simple process??  No, not at all.  RMS couldn't see my new MID and had to call Global Payments, who informed them the account had been set up incorrectly and they would need to change it to be an RMS account.  Global Payments have no sense of urgency and if customer service agents keep saying "Basically...." to me I will end up blowing my top!  I am unable to reopen without a card reader and therefore losing money - are Global Payments going to reimburse me???  I doubt it!

We have started using Retail merchant services for a card terminal back in April 2020. RMS use global payments, Why i have no idea. I was aware of becoming PCI compliance and there would be a fee of £75 a month if not compliant. After endless amount of attempts with this. RMS has admitted there was a issue with logins. I have had 5 or 6 password resets to be able to get in to become PCI compliance. Till this day Global payments have racked up a £2000 bill for us and have taken out of our account without notifying us. I have finally been able to sort out PCI with a email on the 2nd Feb from RMS to congratulate me on becoming PCI compliant. I have received this email 'I am emailing you today regarding your PCI Compliance I have been advised by Global Payments that an extension was placed on your account to complete the PCI and I have been advised that this should avoid any fees being applied In March.' And what do you know today another £150 has been withdrawn from our account? I don't get how this is even legit to just take what ever money they want from our account and get away with it? The issue i have is that on numerous phone calls they seem to blame each other? They both try to pass the blame on and try and redirect my call. Very unhappy!!! If anyone knows how i can take this further would be much appropriated.

This review refers to my experiences with the Ecom Support team, which I would have rated 4/5 from 2008 to 2019, but has been very different in 2020 and 2021. Hopefully not all departments have been affected by the same decline.

We have been using - and recommending - their payment gateway integration since the HSBC-branded and Realex days. Support and developer documentation were both excellent up until 2020, but in the last 12 months the availability, quality and timeliness of responses has fallen off a cliff, to a level that - even cutting some slack for the pandemic - is currently inexcusable, so poor that it resembles a customer support parody more than it does a global organisation entrusted with our transactions.

They have been simply unrecognisable from the organisation where account managers and ecommerce support would always reply to emails by the end of the next working day and often the same day.

They have gone from that to a shambles, Ecom Support no longer seem to answer the phone (I have been on hold for over an hour at times with no answer), they ignore/lose many emails, and on the rare occasions that emails are replied to they are replied to a week or more late, often with obvious delaying tactics that ask a pointless question which they already have the answer to within the thread they are replying to (or would have the answer to hand if they were actually using a proper ticketing system), so that one has to reply and wait another week for another response.

[update] It took several months of emails back and forth with long delays between replies, to achieve what should have been possible in a 5-10 minute phone call - and it had still not been completed by the time of first writing this review. After leaving a critical review I was contacted by a member of the Customer Experience team the same day, who was polite, understanding and apologetic, and asked me to forward the details of my case to them to escalate on my behalf. The final part of my long standing request was resolved the next working day.

I have since been asked to revise my review. Several months of delays, hours of chasing, time spent on hold with no answer, checking social media and developer communities to see whether my issue was unique (it wasn't), time wasted planning workarounds, have cost unnecessary time and therefore money. So whilst I am relieved to have my particular issue resolved for now, I won't be improving my 1 star rating until it is earned by future positive experiences.

I just hope that this situation is temporary and a cruel coincidence of increased workload from SCA / 3DSv2 / PSD2 coinciding with reduced staffing levels due to the pandemic, and that we will see a return to acceptable customer service before long.

I know what it's like to be a developer with too many tickets and not enough time, so I gave them the benefit of the doubt. The pandemic should however not be an excuse for not implementing the basics that an organisation of this size should have - for example a proper support ticketing system instead of a shared mailbox with an apologetic autoresponse; for example a phone number that actually gets answered (even if it's only by a less-technical gatekeeper advising you what the delay is and where you can expect to be in the queue) and a phone number that does not keep you on hold indefinitely at times when there is no chance of it being answered.

In the meantime my advice to others unfortunately is that if you are waiting weeks or months for a response then your best option is to complain the loudest in public in order to jump the queue.

Cancelling our contract today!! 

After 45mins waiting on hold from 10.23 to 11.01 and being switched from team to team with no communication between themselves and me having to repeat  myself over and over i finally got to speak with the cancellation team. 

These are the reasons we are cancelling 

• Charges are way too high - After being clients for more than 3 years our contract ended and then there was a massive upsurge in rates. As a company we feel Global Payments should contact their clients to inform/notify of the increases to make us aware and find out how you can offer alternative rates to keep us as clients.

• Charged £150 extra over 6 weeks for PCI compliance fine - we pay £3.50 each month for this service and we are more than aware it takes a click of a button to administer this (after speaking to other companies we have since found out that this is a service they provide for their clients to avoid fines) NOT HAPPY ABOUT THIS CHARGE AT ALL!

• Charging £15 per month for the online statements - this is free with other merchants and who also have free apps to download to keep track of charges and fees

• Card terminal charge - £25 per month, other providers charge around £15 

• Paper statements- we have asked on numerous occasions to stop paper statements, the day we signed up with Global Payments we stated we preferred to have no paper statements but yet we still are receiving these at a charge £4 per month.

• Customer services - has been less than adequate until we said we are leaving.... we have called on many occasions and not had call backs... we called last Thursday morning and the representative on the phone said she would have someone call back as urgent and nothing and its now Tuesday and still no call. 

TO TOP IT OFF... a fee of £75 for refurbishment of the terminal WHAT??? We have paid Global Payments above and beyond for the terminal and for other excess fees this just confirms we are doing the best thing by leaving this company.

When we initially signed with Global payments (also known as Open Edge), we were told and shown that we would save on average about $200 a month in fees. When doing a cost comparison, we found that in 2019 our overall credit card revenue went down from 2018 by 2.6%, but our fees went up 12.6%!!!

I approached Global Payments for my start-up, a 100% electric motorcycle retail business and despite being in a restricted sector, within a week we received approval for a GPRS terminal, a Social Commerce account and an e-commerce account. The due diligence process was very thorough, but entirely understandable for a regulated payments service, however, I was delighted to have been approved. At every step my area manager, Andy Flint, was attentive and supportive of my application, which is refreshing in this era of algorithm-based decisioning, where the personal touch can be completely absent. I couldn't recommend or praise the entire Global Payments team more highly and look forward to a very long and successful partnership.

I received reminders about PCI compliance stating it expired in January 2020 but as I had proof of payment and trying to contact anyone by telephone is  to put it mildly time consuming I took no notice.
I shut the shop on 26th March as per Government instructions and later checking my bank statements I found I had been charged £104.89 for March period my normal monthly bill being around £35 then £83.20 for April £83.20 for May and am waiting for June bill
my shop reopened on June 15th and the machine had not been used in all that time
When I questioned Global Payments about the charges they said it was to cover the extra risk of non compliant card payments and they had to tried to contact me on 20th April and 6th May on my business number (they have my mobile number) when the entire country was in lock down
I have cancelled my contract which I have been informed will cost me a further £75 to have the terminal refurbished 
I would not touch this company with a fourteen foot sterilized bargepole

Dealing with Security Metrics, GP’s PCI DSS supplier has been very difficult. They failed a vulnerability scan which they said was “in my network”. It actually turns out to be a piece of software in my telecoms co’s router. They asked me to get into the router, find out what the firmware version was then ask my telecoms provider (Daisy) to confirm if this was the latest firmware etc etc This should never have been my job and many small businesses would have struggled. In the meantime being charged non-compliance fees. GP are simply too big for smaller businesses.

NIGHTMARE Howard "Buddy" Cooper is the WORST salesperson I've ever experienced in my 20+ years of business. Buddy hides from my phone calls for 6 WEEKS after I submitted our bank statements, so I finally asked customer service to let me work with a diff sales agent. Then Buddy magically reappears and we finally get on the phone and we AGREE to schedule Friday weekly calls. He then misses the FIRST CALL and every single call we scheduled after that - no progress. Then a month later, I find out our account was actually approved weeks before, no communication from Buddy - and finally when we speak, and Buddy still has NO IDEA we got approved. Buddy then arranged a physical storefront audit to a registered agent address which has no store front, REALLY?...the application (and account type) was clearly for an e-commerce website. So 2 months go by and Buddy then asks for our last 3 months bank statements, which we had ALREADY submitted! So I ask a customer service manager again to let me work with diff salesperson - they say yes but nobody reaches out. A week later I call again and get the name of the NEW person we're supposed to deal with - I email that person. No reply. I call again and they tell me the new rep will surely reach out within 3 biz days. No contact. I email new person again. No reply. Repeat 3 more times via customer service. Every time we speak, the story is the same "wait 3 business days and someone will reach out". I specifically ask them to reach out via email so that there is a record. Nobody reaches out. NOT EVEN AN EMAIL. Global Payments took almost 3 months to approve our account...then, even AFTER we are approved, they cannot figure out how to schedule a setup call for us to be able to start accepting payments. It actually feels like they are messing with us on purpose. I have given up after 3 months of back and forth and Buddy's overwhelming negligence. On top of everything, Buddy tried to throw in a monthly fee of $100 PER MONTH for a Non-PCI Compliance fee. I have never seen a Non-PCI fee that high in my entire career and I have been in the Merchant Services industry for over a decade. Thanks, Buddy, you're killing it. Literally. DO NOT work with this business. If they weren't such a huge company I'd say it feels more like a scam business with how MIA they are and how NOBODY knows what's going on. Extreme negligence. Bad vibes all around. No accountability. Never went anywhere. Work with these guys and your business will get stuck in the mud too. Yeesh! NIGHTMARE EXPERIENCE

i dont think i have ever in my life received a worse service. (This was all before the quarentine lockdown so no excuse really).
this is my email to them which they have completely blanked. 

First of all, id like to make a complaint, and dispute the cost I've been given, as for 90% of the month my card reader has been unusable.

First of all:
When I joined, I had been told I will have money in the bank the next day. I haven’t had a single case of this yet. Im still awaiting a transaction 4  business days later…

So from the start.
I had to constantly chase global payments to see how my application was going, constantly getting promised updates and calls back which I never received. 
Once the machine had been received, no one followed up, until I called saying I cant do any transactions, only training ones. I also complained about my personal address being on the receipt. 
After countless calls and no one getting back to me, a nice gentleman notified me the card machine was faulty. Great.
So I got instructed to return the machine just as I received it and it will be a simple swap over. 
Once new machine arrived, it had 0 rolls with it, no charging leads. Just the bare machine.
I went to one transaction of the £5800 and had that banked. Well I thought I did.

Noone told me about the end of day. They told me theyd show me how to do it, but again. Countless calls and emails. No replies. But I could look in the manual right? No. again the machine had nothing in the box
After googling it I finally found out how to do it. So I tried to do it…but wait, theres a code on it. 
So again countless calls and getting told id have a call back. NOTHING. Until I finally got through to someone who could help, who finally lifted the code and got that resolved. End of day done and money in a few days later. 
After the countless end of days and trying to resolve this, the tiny bit of receipt paper I had, was gone.

So the next customer - £280 (still awaiting to get that banked, I took the transaction days over 2 weeks ago now)
This machine was useless to me with no receipt paper. But was informed of a cardholder not present way I could do.  This was not the way I was shown later on,they told me to call a number and simply follow it. So I did (0345 number)
After being given a transaction authorisation  code I then left, thinking it was successful. 
Unable to do the end of day, I had to wait for the paper. So more calls and emails and phone calls I finally got the message across. And the cables came… just no paper. AGAIN I called, and a few days later the paper came through.
So I popped that in, did the end of day … £0..?
So more and more phonecalls later and emails. And I had a call through. To be told. The method id been given was wrong. 
So I had to carry out the transaction again. The only thing is the customer is 50 milesfrom me. So an embarrassing phonecall to him, and him getting a bit edgy about it, I finally got the details. 
So again after a phonecall back, I attempted the transaction…unable. Again,….unable.
Turns out the machine didn’t have it installed. ( by the way im doing all of this while still working, a massive huge inconvenience for me, and extremely distressing)
So after finishing a job, the gentleman installed the update and I attempted the transaction with him on the line. 
It went through.
Its showing online on my portal as gone through. Yet it hasn’t touched my account. 
I've emailed numerous times, yet no replies. An absolute joke.
So here I am, being told to cough up £450. For a machine which has been redundant for me. 
The customer service I have received has been absolutely abysmal. Horrific infact.
How HSBC have you as a partner goes beyond me.
Nilotpal Pramalik

We integrate with Global Payments in Ireland to provide bookings and ticketing systems for us and for our clients. They have consistently brought in secure products ahead of the curve - we used 3-d secure with them first and we were early adopters of their card storage product - which is excellent: While other applications in our area were doing Luhn verification (Mod10) of card numbers, Global Payments (then Realex) were able to confirm to us that card was OTB (Open to Buy) when making bookings and this gave us a competitive edge at the time.

As time passes these type of features become more widely available and available from other services, but what continues to differentiate Global Payments is the technical support - there is a human at the other end of the phone and they know the intricacies of the local banking systems that they are connected to upstream. When dealing with transactions at scale this knowledge becomes critical.

I can (and do) recommend them.

Positives, only ever had very few, brief (hour max) outages in all those years. Terminal replaced due to upgrade & old age quickly. Good CS responsive on phone but never really needed much.
However checking the rates these last few days I find it is a LOT cheaper elsewhere. Foolishly my fault/faith in companies keeping prices reasonable for loyalty.
Comparing the main, normal credit card fee (majority of my business) other payments are much better also.
I find I can get 0.9% cheaper from Barclaycard (I only name as not some obscure provider). I can do quite a bit better still if I go non-mainstream, which I am considering.
I am fairly sure I will go from about £400pm to £250 if I go BC and elsewhere easily under £200, saving over £200 per month!!

I know there were regular letters "had to increase prices" "in line with industry" "sorry but the extra costs involved", I believed them, then they really went to town with the extra's charges, perhaps across the industry though, I guess the special loyalty cards, it seems we were covering all the costs for them to give card holders those benefits. Originally told these would have minimal effect, barely notice on our bills, a few %. Mine ended up being about 10% extra on my invoices.
I know when I moved to them many years ago I did so because they had the very good rates, I did thorough research then. I quickly looked back & it does seem had a relentless 0.1% or so increase each year.

I am angry at my failure to check, every other utility/insurance I am fanatical about getting the best rates, fortunately it does seem the gap has widened slowly else I would be thinking around £20K over the 10 years but still sure many thousands worse off.

I would love to know what rates similar companies/turnover get or if I applied now. I can't imagine anyone would go with them, perhaps new businesses/poor turnover/average trans/risk they are comparable.
They should analyse business & even reduce rates but certainly hold steady unless absolutely necessary. in 10 years I bet they have never had a single refund or disputed transaction, average of £120 and 99% face to face, turnover steady increase & cards a higher percentage over cash,cheques, every year.
Tempted to try their retention's just to see what they offer but so angry I simply checked on termination fees. Made me laugh £75 restocking fee for card terminal. I thought the 10 years of monthly rental might have covered that. Gave them £5K last year and all those years & they want £75, says a lot.

Global payments have been always a nightmare to deal with. 
Being a loyal cutomer for over 15 years, i was scared to switch, but
my decision to leave them was made in November 19.
It was their customer service manner and new computer online system that was the final straw. The new online system is by far the worst, least user friendly system and they know this, because i was told this when i rang them.
Contacting them on their help line to sort the problem out, was again a very frustrating process, let alone having to understand someone who doesnt speak good english and is rude.

I hasten to add, nothing wrong with my computer, all cookies cleared, just their system!
Not being able to submit my online bank statements on time was a tedious task and lenthy. Going paperless is not a good idea in this instance, you get charged for this privilege for postage admin costs and you pay again to send recorded delivery a week later to your accountant!
Thankfully timing of this awful experience, coincided with a Payment Consultant called Stuart L, recommendation from another business to get in touch with in.
He was astounded when showing him my last 12 months bank statements , and said we had been utterly ripped off , paying over 60 percent more a month on average than most businesses with our turnover.
Even though being PCI compliant for a number of years , I was paying £1200 interests charges on card payments a month on £40,000 , yet Stuart has clients with a turnover of £375,000 per month with interest charges of less than a £1000 per month.
On Stuart’s recommendation , i switched to Paymentsense and my interests charges are 70 percent less than Global Payments. They would be a lot lower than this , if I didn’t have customer not present transactions. When you run a hotel , you take payment within your cancellation policy, so a customer who doesn’t show , unfortunately for them they are charged. But we pay a commission for this ontop of the card charges for visa debit, mastercards of an extra 0.9 percent via global payments compared to 0.2 percent and less with other merchant providers. 
Switching to Paymentsense was the best thing I ever did, they are transparent, rates are very low and customer service is excellent.
It took 2 weeks to set up, not the utter rubbish Global payments say which they takes 3 months and would ultimately got another £3600 out of me on their card transaction charges. 
Seriously everyone out there using Global payments are being ripped off, they are not transparent, charging customers extorntionate interest card rates, poor customer service, poor online banking system and simply a scam.

[AVOID AVOID AVOID] Business located in Calgary - This company overcharged us about $9,500 in fees over 1 year and 3 months. Initially, you start out paying the average collective ~5% for processing credit cards (including monthly fees, and their thousand other fees). Then they increased it (by adding more fees) June 2018 to 8-9% of our sales. Apparently, they gave us "notice" through back page on our month statement that does not get mailed out (you can only access through website, and my parents are not tech savvy nor is their primary language English). AND THEN, they added MORE FEES AGAIN in March 2019 to collectively equal 10-12% of our total credit card sales. THIS IS ROBBERY. If you don't refute within 3 months, it means you've accepted the rate. My parents only started taking notice when their bank account balance seriously began to dwindle then I came in to investigate. They have offered to lower the collective rates to about 40% of current 10-12% charge, but that's still higher than other major merchant rates. We are going to change.

WATCH OUT everyone. They're scam artists, they tell you to go get a lawyer if you want to try to get your money back. Terrible. They will keep increasing your fees if you don't take notice and they will singlehandedly BANKRUPT you by bleeding you dry. Also, there is a $700 cancellation charge because your contract "auto" renews, so even if you've been with the company for 6-7 years, and they havemade a fortune off you, they will still do this. They hung up. This is what you can expect from the caring customer focused staff in the Philippines. Cannot log in to Business View and their verification code doesn't work either. They have switched to a new system - which I cannot log in to either. Spent about 2 hours trying to resolve it. Going  back a couple of years Security Metrics' scans (Global Payments' partner) made it ridiculously difficult to pass compliance standards compared to Trustwave, a PCI market leader. Never had any issue with Trustwave and Global Payments makes no money out of the relationship - funny that. Under Security Metrics scan failures allow Global Payments to charge high monthly penalties - what a winner! Their charges are the highest we have come across for PCI penalties. Their card fees are high too - although if you negotiate you can bring down the rate to a more competitive percentage; this has to be renegotiated annually. Recently £15 per month has begun to be added to my bill for Reporting Pro (not optional - just informed of this change). Consequently we can't wait to switch provider after 8 years - honestly don't know how this company can pick up good reviews?
