Our fees have increased by 50% for the month of April. And I was told that there is nothing they can do for me for the month of April.  However, they are offering to reduce my "rates" starting May and moving forward. We will have to wait and see if they follow through.
My advice is this. Read their Notes! Do not trust this company.

As a customer of Global Payments for over 3 years, I have had nothing but problems with this company. Firstly, when it come to the intitial contract agreement, my company was promised competitive rate charges on the Credit and Debit card transaction fees. Only recently, I analysed the statements and failed to see that I have been exploited over the course of the contract, Global Payments had added multiple additional charges and ‘service’ fees that were not initially discussed in the contract agreement with my business. 
I then decided to compare prices elsewhere and found that many of Global payments fees were 20% higher than its competitors.  In addition to the massive savings in debit/credit charges Offered by other companies,  I found that many of the ‘service’ fees provided by Global payments were just another way they used to exploit myself and my business.
I found the customer service team very difficult to deal with when I had any problems with my card machine , it would take weeks to sort anything out. I found myself being bounced around different departments of the telephone support team and any time I was promised a call back… nothing. I tried to contact Global payments regarding my rates while still in contract and received a response almost 3 weeks later. However, when it came to an issue Global Payments had with myself, the response would be almost instant. 
Upon ending my contract with global payments, I was charged for a full month’s rental because one of the payments had went through on the 1st day of the following month. Furthermore, I was charged a ridiculous terminal collection fee of £30+Vat. 

Do your research !
The support we got from Daniel Gregorio and the team was outstanding. All questions were answered clearly and promptly. We found them to be efficient, diligent and extremely helpful.
Great Payment Gateway and have to commend the support staff that are always on hand to support you with any technical questions.

Don't be fooled! I was told they charge 1% for credit card processing and NOTHING else. My Accountant spoke to them directly and they said they only charge 1% because Debt was so low. When my Accountant told Ricky that we only do business with other businesses, they said no problem. The average merchant will balance it out and it's still 1% INCLUDING INTERCHANGE! The sent me the DocuSign contract and it did say 1%, but there was a tiny "X" in a box above that that said INTERCHANGE + Pass Thru!! SCAM!

Setting up the online payment gateway with Global Payments was a simple, straight forward process from the initial application through to going live.

The Global Payments team were always on hand with any questions and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them for a payment solution.
Excellent Service -No hesitation in recommending Global Payments
Easy to deal with, excellent cooperation, and the web portal is excellent

Top Quality Service.

Fasial Bashar and Ilyas Elahi have been exceptional in helping us set up a virtual terminal when one of requested a very short time ago.  Both offered the highest level of service and support and has made the experience easy and straightforward.  
Thank you very much!
I found this experience to be seamless and Fasial was extremely efficient and very helpful to deal with

I'm stuck into this company until I can afford to pay my developers to move. Global's website for invoices and statements is deplorable and takes multiple attempts to work, I often give up. Their customer service is "with attitude", and users are offered total contempt by this supplier's customer service. I recommend you avoid them like the plague.

Excellent Customer service and speedy response to queries.
Tasks actioned accurately and in a timely manner.
Friendly and professional staff.
Would happily recommend Global Payments to other businesses who wish to engage with a company who are professional and deliver a great service.
The team were great at guiding me through the whole process. Once set up, the site is easy to navigate around use.
Great experience and very helpful

I can't speak highly enough of Global Payments and everyone I've come into contact with there. Incredibly helpful and patient and "on your side"! I've recently been speaking to one of their team about a problem that was totally not of their making and there were many times when they could have told me it was my website providers job to sort it out (it really was) but he didn't - he kept plugging away at it with me. I've also spoken to them before about fees charged and some kind soul there spent half an hour explaining all aspects of my invoices and where savings could be made - it was well beyond the call of duty. So, in summary, I like them. Lucy

Stay away!!!!
A costumer of them for 4 years everything was ok but for a week late in filling the company’s report which doesn’t even concern them!!! They said the account is a “risk” and they will terminate our contract, I said fine than I will find another provider to process payments with...and than it started...”we will hold all funds on our account for 6 months to make sure there is no chargebacks on your account”...my company process over 1M pounds every year and we Had less then 0.05% charge back true all the years we use there services...anyway they said they will review the account in 3 months time and will hold about 50,000£ until they will be sure no chargeback are on the way.
Reading all the last reviews it seems like they do the same thing to clients on a regular basis ( strong feeling they use those funds for there own cash flow) it’s been more then 4 months now and just recived an email stating there is a chargeback of 1,500£ out of 50k and will have to hold the funds for another 6 months.
I’m definitely going after them now will full power I really don’t care spending 50k to get the 50k back but this company have to learn a lesson here. The only reason my bussniss survived is that personally I can support it until I’ll get the money back.
So please if you want your bussniss to keep on going stay far away from this company!
I hope that this company will be shut down and go broke there is no place in 2019 for a company that behave this way and I’m sure you will pay for all the losses you caused me.
Very quick response to a problem I had, very polite and friendly and straight to the point

Customer service, What a load of rubbish!!!
If I could give a lower rating I would, For the first time in 12 years we had our first charge back and I was shocked by this too.... A customer who rang us to place an order over the telephone to which this was dealt with like any other telephone order and dispatch the same day using DPD courier.
We then had a letter from Global Payments saying that this customer didn't authorise the payment and a charge back was being applied to our account, GP was now asking for proof that we had taken an order from this customer, ie: DPD signature and invoice with customer details on it, all provided within 1 day of receiving the letter, a week later we receive another letter from GP to say that they are not defending this matter any further and the matter is closed.
I rang GP to ask the reason for this and why wasn't the information we provided enough to show that the customer had rang us to place the order, I was told that over the telephone payments are not covered and ruled in the customers favour and basically end off no appeal or request of any other type of information.
We are now looking to seek another merchant and take the customer to the small claims court.

8/5/19 And yet since the reply from GP to this review I have yet to be contacted...Customer service?? indeed there is none.

Very easy to deal with - the service from the support staff, particularly with the management of users (creating new ones, deleting old ones and resetting passwords) is very efficient and usually very speedy.

The service I have had from Daniel Gregorio is second to none.  As a business we have been very demanding at times but he always dealt with our requests promptly and professionally and is continuing to do so. I Would like to say thank you for all your help and support over the last few months

I regret that Global are my card acquirer. I cannot believe such a shoddy company is HSBC's preferred supplier. As if the charges (including PCI compliance) are not enough of a rip off, they have now moved from previous day payments credited to my account to 3, sometimes 5 days and I cannot actually speak to a human being, to resolve this. Now looking to move acquirer. and also make a formal complaint to HSBC, FCA and Consumer Credit If I could have given less than one star, I would have. They shouldn't be in business.

Update 26 April 2019; reply received to my review, suggesting an on-line contact would resolve my issues. Just to record that I had already independently done this and have had one reply, which completely missed the point. Will wait to see on that one. Most commercial bank managers I have spoken to, think modern technology and Gb connections should speed up, rather than delay receipts. Talking to other retaillers, Global Payments name seems to come up often and not in a good light. The fact remains, funds have gone out of customer bank accounts and are taking anywhere from 3 to 5 days longer to reach mine. Somebody is making a turn, somewhere. Just be honest about it!
Secure and trustworthy gateway backed up up by an extremely responsive help team. I would not hesitate to recommend.
Very helpful customer service every time I have needed to contact them. Would recommend them highly.

I have received excellent customer service from Barry in relation to our account with Realex. His prompt, accurate and simple responses have made the process very simple.
fast and knowledgeable reply, thanks

Each time he has been very professional & made sure our issues were or enquiries resloved very efficiently even when I'm sure some of our questions were a bit basic sometimes.
Customer service is trebly bad. Nothing to say.  Totally peach me off with attitude and level of non-helping behaviour.

Adding a new company to our E Commerce facility with Global Payments was seamless and hassle free. Business done the way it should be but others don't always deliver. Really appreciate Global Payments efficiency.

Great service and prompt responses!

WOW where do i even start with this. Easy enough to set up your account. Then the problems begin. Apparently you have a signed direct debit from me ? very interesting as i have never even seen the form to send you and you can't even tell me the date it was submitted as there isn't one on it. So i wait for my transactions to appear in bank. Have they arrived NOPE. Well if your staff were not stupid enough to enter my incorrect bank details there would be no problems !!!!! So now i have to close my business and wait for you to pull your fingers out of your asses to get the thousands of pounds in payments you owe me. Oh yes i have confirmation that it was an error from your company. UPDATE - So you call me yesterday at 16.30 to tell me you transferred money to my bank for me and it would be there in 2 hours, well it is now 10.32 Saturday morning and it still isn't there. Where the hell is my money ? UPDATE 04/03/19 Well today is Monday and still no sign of any money. Turns out you LIED and never transferred it at all WOW !!!! Try getting some staff who understand English for a start that would help you. This company is nothing but a scam. I'm starting to wonder if i'll see the money you owe me this side of Christmas.

I would actually like to give you no stars but you cannt do that ,hate being told that they care I run a small B&B worst service ever customer care does not exist terminal support is useless still in dialogue about money not going onto my account 
appalling.

We have been connected to Global Payments by intermediary company called RMS.

Global payments charge £44.60 inc VAT just to be PCI compliant (if you have multiple accounts it will be more) 

And if you are unlucky and were non compliant for a month it is £150. Extortionate. 

Their customer service is non existent, they will take 45-60 minutes to answer the phone and will not hesitate to put the phone down on you if they dont like your tone. 
A very bad blast from the past - you'd think this level of service doesnt exist in 2019....

I paid my way to disconnect any contact with them, and wouldnt recommend them to anyone.

Why can't I speak to someone who is fluent in English? No problem at all with the service at the terminal just can't seem to get what I want! EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. Would be a 5 Star if they could understand me. 3 phone calls today about 120mins wasted. PLEASE HELP.  REF: 04363380

EDIT: Below is not even a correct email address, this just says it all.

EDIT 1: Having emailed you I'm told that I have to call. When I ask you to call me no that's not possible. Great service.
Was a customer for a few months and then asked for help regarding PCI Compliance, was promised a call back, never got one. Sent emails and heard nothing back. Am now going elsewhere.

By far the worst payment gateway to use,we had a couple of fraudulent payments take through their system and when we tried to defend them with call recordings we were told they wouldnt accept this and in turn our account was closed with nearly £10,000 in it.
I did not get any notification of closure of my account as well,when i called up i was laughed at down the phone by an eastern european gentleman saying that i was 'in denial' about the way my business worked, after wanting to speak to some one with a bit more decency i had to wait 3 days to receive a call and was told by a woman there that because the account was closed for fraudulent transaction (the ones i couldn't send proof that they wernt fraudulent) that the customers i did have who were legally within their 14 day cooling off period that i could not refund them through their service,the service that was closed to stop any further chargebacks ,i was then told to tell my customers to do a chargeback beacuase i wasnt aloud to refund them!!!
The most ridiculous company on the market

RMS supply our PDQ (card machine) they use a company called Global Payments as the bank that processes these transactions DO NOT USE GLOBAL PAYMENTS we had quite a few rejected credits that amounted to over £16,000 eventually we have had these credits transfered into our bank account.
GLOBAL PAYMENTS told me your bank has rejected receipt of funds, not giving any evidence of the transaction reference then when they gave  transaction references that do not exist, no supervisors/managers available to speak to, stalling tactics I can't wait to leave be warned. 
Overall experience life destroying owing thousands to people when you know you have the money but these jokers think its ok to p__s you about with your money.
No Senior personnel, I really felt like suicide!

Typical response 12 WEEKS from making this review, a truly unprofessional company stay away please (we will see if they break their record of 12 weeks in response to this, DONT HOLD YOUR BREATH! it must take that long via the Philippines.

WOW a response but it looks like an automatic response, considering we are still with this unprofessional company and it normally takes 2-3 weeks of constant phone calls and unanswered emails, why would I even think about contact they have all my details maybe the professional thing to do would be to contact me direct to get this sorted not the other way around! I wonder if its anything to do with me being out of contract in the next few months.
What a joke!

Would never recommend this business to any company of any size.  Our contract was cancelled with no explanation after 8 years of business with minimal chargebacks (if any) each year.  Plus we were only given 30 days to find a new processor.  Still holding an astronical amount of funds as "security" with no timeframe as to when we can expect them returned.  Only sense I can make of it is we re-negotiated rates 12 months ago and they were no longer able to fund their excursions from the fees being charged our 2 merchant accounts.  (Although they were still making a healthy profit off us.)  Will forever have a bad taste in my mouth from the customer service (or lack therof) and complete lack of communication we received from Global Payment.

Was told when I enquired that it would take 5-7 days for an E-commerce merchant number, it’s now 65 days and still no number. I am existing Global Payments customer with face to face payment but that doesn’t seem to make no difference. I have called and emailed a number of times and only received emails saying ‘not sure what the hold up is’. My last correspondence was now 2 weeks ago and still waiting, will keep pestering but taking business elsewhere. Please someone from a Global who reads this have the decency to contact me.

Waiting  for over 30 seconds for my calls to be answered. When answered the responses I received were not of the standard that it was before. 
Rude, not at all helpful and the colleague did not even provide their name. 
There has been a dive in the quality of the support and service.

Horrible! They told me I'd have zero processing fees which was a lie. When money wasn't deposited into my account I couldn't get a straight answer. I switched companies and closed the account.I just so happened to be smart enough to call the bank right after so they wouldn't try to rob me, then they charged me 95 bucks because the bank rejected their withdrawal and 375 for closing the account after they told me there would be no termination cost. So I reviewed my contract and realized they had falsified my application. Now I'm in collections.
Very professional an easy set up the sales rep we had Craig Calvert was very professional and helped us out a lot. Would definitely recommend.

They don't even deserve one star. HORRIBLE customer service. They put you on hold for hours and transfer you from one country to another to get to their "Correct" department. They increase their rates without notice. When we closed the account, they kept charging us monthly to suck every penny we got. Whenever we tell them that we already close the account, they say that this is the last charge, yeah right.
Can't get rid of them unless you change bank account.  They are like parasites. Avoid at all cost.

thank u very much ， im 100% happy with your services,
Excellent service provided and as ever Jo was extremely helpful in getting us set up.

Very happy with the service from the team at Global Payments.  Lee Botterill is always very response and a pleasure to deal with, and we have used them for a few years now. I would happily recommend to others.
Joel Smith was extremely helpful with setting up the payment portal for my business, Excellent service!!
Helpful and easy service
A good company. Everything works smoothly.
We switched provider of card processing services and found the service to be excellent.  Our manager has been very helpful and ensured that everything went smoothly.

I open my shoe store next week.I chose Global Payments to handle my 
credit card transactions as they had been recommended to me.My Area
Manager Ilias Elahi  has handled the whole project with care ,skill and true
professionalism from start to finish.
He has shown endless patience with me and and i can now accept card payments with a week to spare.He promised that the set up would be easy
and in spite of my concerns everything worked first time .
Well Done Ilyas and Global Payments for your excellent service and attention to detail.
If like me you are a little daunted by modern technology you will be in safe hands. 
Keith Martin 
Senior Partner  Bells Group Buxton Derbyshire.

Brilliant service, very easy and kept me up to date along the way. They promised to deliver a service and followed through with that promise. We left our previous provider due to bad costumer service and we found that global payments not only offered better service but a better price too. Thanks to B Hilton for all his help in bringing both our merchant numbers on board, and to HSBC & Bira for bringing together my bank account, merchant services and wider business services together !
Very professional service, no complaints whatsoever.
Great customer service and experienced back of house staff who look to deal with every query promptly and effectively.
We have been working with Jo Warner at Global Payments for a number of years now and the service is excellent.
Very helpful staff and helped with all my questions straight away.

I am a veteran independent software engineer and developer who has integrated dozens of different payment systems into sites from small to huge.  I have never seen anything as bad as Global Payments. 

The company seems to be a disorganized collection of acquired companies. We signed up for a GP test account, and as we get deeper into the online documentation, the actual payment service involved is a 2015 acquisition called RealEx Payments. As we started writing test code, we had a few questions. Several phone calls later, I am told that the only support channel is through an email address. Fine. I sent email, waited several days, and received an adequate response. During this delay, I discovered several more issues. Their documentation is incomplete, and often simply incorrect -- what's written does not match the real-world requirements or results at all.  Worse yet, the API is full of gaping holes - basic functionality you would expect to find is absent.  When you ask them about it, they just stop responding.

I've dealt with many payment processors over the years, so this is not completely unheard of, just the first of many "red flags."  I end up calling Dublin Ireland, trying to track down the RealEx people, who are initially responsive and helpful in solving one problem (out of ten?).  As the number of problems begins to increase, though, they refer me to someone at another company in the US, Heartland. This guy is nice enough, but I'm still not getting answers. Turns out, he is relaying my questions back to Dublin!  So, I email them again. Almost a week later, I get a response that reads basically, "read the documentation and xxck off." The message apparently being, "what you see is what you get, and we're not going to help you."  Thanks.

So, I've wasted FOUR WEEKS doing what should have taken 4 days. Now we're pushing the whole thing back to the corporate client behind this project and we'll see what happens.  My recommendation is to avoid Global Payments at all costs.  It is definitely not worth the trouble.
Great customer service response from Fasial, quick, patient and thorough.
Brilliant service right from the first point of contact. Highly recommend!!
Absolutely excellent service, would recommend to anyone! Thanks
My thanks to Sinead, who speedily resolved my login problems, with the least fuss.

Everything so far done very well 
Lee Botterill handled every thing very professionally

Sinead Martin was very helpful and gave clear instructions of what needed to be done.

Her response time was exceptional and solved my query straight away.
Extremely helpful service, always contactable and open to queries.

The service given was great, we were given our own dedicated contact (David Rowett) and he walked us through the process start to finish.  The process only took a few days and everything explained in detail.
Very professional service.  Transition from another provider was flawless.
Helpful friendly staff
Vishali was extremely helpful from the offset. Everything was arranged on time and she went out of her way to respond to my email even though she was on leave.
Terrible service regret using them
Updating the template for all of our sub accounts was made a very simple painless and speedy process by the Operations Analyst.

Lydia has been so helpful! Much of the finance and banking elements discussed are out of my usual remit, but Lydia has been so patient and helpful with all my tedious questions! Such a delight to work with, all be it, a short while
Very good experience, everything rang smoothly with the initial setup and the support staff were extremely helpful, cannot fault a thing.
Excellent level of customer service from Malaki Lumsden. Knowledgeable and thorough processing. Regular updates on the progress of the order. Prompt responses to all communications.
Vishalli has been excellent and very professional, she explained explained every thing

Firstly we had an account with a merchant service called nochex who was then acquired and taken over a while later by global payments.

We are a fairly new online ecommerce business and was doing as expected with small growth patterns starting to build, when we where hit by fraud as global payments was accepting the payments taking their percentage out from each transaction and forwarding the money on to our selfs, we had no indication that we was actually accepting fraudulent payments. 

We received an email from global payments stating that the account was now closed and we would no longer be allowed to take payments, it seems to keep costs down global payments call centres are in different countries with operators speaking very very poor English. After much confusion and being passed to numerous departments I was handed over to a lady by the name of Justine if I’m not mistaken who explained to me that they would not be reinstating the account and there was no way it was possible even If I was to pay back the fraudulent traction’s (chargebacks) basically the account was closed and that was that! I did explain I was offered no advice on the set up and how to prevent fraud and would it not be possible to set up a fraud flag management detector moving forward to prevent further fraud before the transaction takes place, the lady then advised me that the decision to close the account was actually hers and no one else’s. 

So I was left, a new online ecommerce  business with no way of taking payments receiving letters from global payments instructing me that I would need to pay back all the chargebacks or the debt would be passed on to debt collection agency with added costs, I couldn’t believe this company was now threatening me with a recovery acency after I had agreed to pay back the sum they claimed was fraudulent. I contacted global payments again and explained that if the account could be reinstated and I could start taking payments  again and would then be in a position to set up some type of payment plan I was told this would not be possible  I explained without I payment gateway I had no business, no way of taking payments. 

The decision was made to apply for other merchant accounts with a lot of companies approving only to inform me a short while later that the application was now declined with no reasons why, I then contacted global payments and spoke with Justine again who I explained my current situation and asked if I had been blacklisted somehow? As companies where  approving the business to inform me less than a week later that they would no longer be able to offer me a gateway. Justine informed that this was not the case it was solely up to the provider who they did and did not accept and if I wanted to appeal the closure of the account I would need to do so via email to which I did throughly explaining the situation and was told I could expect I response within 48 hours, weeks  went by with no response I rung  global payments and was told someone would contact me this has now been weeks with no response!!! 

Today is where this all fits in to place after months of no merchant account no sales 20+merchants declining the business. Their was hope that a merchant account had actually approved the business the relevant details where sent over to the web developer to integrate, things where finally looking up, a weight had been lifted I could now start taking payments and move forward with the business.  A thought that crossed my mind was that I would now be able to set up a payment plan with global payments and finally and put this whole situation behind me. The new provider was approved 5 days ago and was in the process of being Integrated the company emailed me today explaining that they where very sorry but they could not no longer provide an account and would have to shut the gateway down as the business was associated on MATCH a list of terminated merchants file operated by the card networks. 

I was the one affected by fraud I would be the one occurring the costs yet global payments treated me as if I was the fraudster!! I have not once refused to pay any sum owed (chargebacks) I have only ever tried to work with global payments to reach a civil outcome in the situation only to be treated with zero respect zero remorse zero customer skills zero service!!

I have now as of recent been contacted by a debt recovery acency who have informed me they have taken over the debt in relation to global payments, so global payments could not reach any other type of outcome other than passing the debt on to a collection agency adding additional costs to situation I fiound myself in, global payments have dismembered my business apart and continue to do so.  

Global payments a company who lie when asked if your company has been placed on some type of blacklist for merchant companies. 

Global payments a company with robotic like answers avoid at all costs!!

Great service!

The payment system itself works without fault, occasionally have to chase contacts from the company to find out the status of new customer applications.
Excellent service and quick response
Very easy and simple to set up, great communication.

Excellent customer service. 
From the begining we were fully informed of the costs and benefits. A few myths were dispelled and we were put at ease. We have total confidence in Global
Easy set up of online payment gateway for our club. No issues with the sales process at all.

Setting up my card machine with global payments was stress free and easy, from having meetings on the Isle of Wight with James, to recieving and setting it up. 
Thanks
Excellent service!
Great customer satisfaction by a person who actually cares

Vishali is always pleasant, organised and efficient;

We are pleased with her service.
All resolved quite quickly by James Clegg
great service thank you

Special thanks have to go to Joel Smith SME Sales Associate at Global Payments.

I had all but given up as was struggling to go through the process as we are not a Charity or business but a local village show with a community fund bank account. 

Joel turned around the situation and with the help of Stephanie from Mpos we are now digital!

Thank you both.
Really great service and support lee was extremely helpful and explained in detail what was needed

Recently changed from Worldpay to Global Payments and really pleased so far - i am expecting the money in the bank the next day, which is a lot better than before. Very efficient  account manager who i can get hold of easily by phone/email. Really impressed and wished i had done this a while ago!
I would recommend them if you are thinking of moving from your current provider.
Keith is amazing sorted me out VERY PROFESSIONAL

Recently changed from Worldpay to Global and wished I had done it sooner - cant believe how I managed before - MY MONEY is in MY BANK the very next morning - fantastic rep who is local to me not someone on the end of a phone who I don't even know - really highly recommend to anyone who is thinking of changing

Lee and Jo were both very helpful when setting up our new account, after previous provider had let us down.

Very much looking forward to working with GP and would recommended to anyone.

Lee was extremely professional, helpful and also a pleasure to work with in setting up all our accounts - especially when we were up against tight deadlines to start trading in one venue. Can’t recommend GP enough and we will certainly be working with Lee and GP in all our venues moving forward.
We’re very happy with the customer service we have received so far and are looking forward to working with Global Payments.
Would recommend these guys to anyone! The whole process was dealt with professionally and quickly. Hats off to Rob Mashuk - he did a great job.
One enquiry e mail and within two weeks a site visit has been arranged made and a contract in place and signed. Thank You
Very fast, helpful, efficient and accommodating
Good company, works for us, on both an ad hoc and regular basis

Great customer service, very friendly people. 
We have been working together for more than 1 year and honestly I can recommended it.
Very efficient and very well communicated also very personable
Extremely helpful, efficient & informative.
Knowledgeable and approachable. Resolved issues in a reasonable turnaround time.
Disaster to manage settled payments and no way to download a report to analyse settled transactions.
Joel made the experience very easy start to finish, I would highly recommend Global to anyone
Their card payment system is down and they are not accepting any customer support calls citing they are really busy right now and cannot take our call. How pathetic!

I would like to express my huge thanks to Sinead Martin for guiding me through an application for whitelisting for my company's web site. I am hopeless  with anything to do with computers, but  she was very understanding of my anxiety (and my incompetence!) and helped resolve the problem in a very short space of time. Truly a miracle worker.
David Lees

I have been dealing with Sinead Martin for the past few months and she has always been extremely helpful. We have a large amount of customers using Realex so therefore have many queries on the go at one time. This is never too much trouble for Sinead.
Very helpful and got my problem sorted very efficiently.

Beware of all their fees. Card Processing fees for various cards for example Visa Debit Commercial Cards, Visa Debit Corporate Cards,  Mastercards and Interchange charges and Interchange other charges fees.  There is no way of knowing what percentage charge you are paying to Global when your customer hands you their credit card/debit card.  When you receive the invoice from Global, this is the time you think ''How is it possible that 5 transactions on a Visa Debit Commercial cost me £42.05''  Total receipts that were for this charge is £2940.79.  Global's explanation is that The Cards Schemes are the ones that are putting up their prices.  Global only facilitate.   This is nonsense, I am now with Barclay Merchant services and this 'Card Scheme' does not exist with Barclay.  My merchant bills are halved, only two pages compared to Global's 10 pages of card type abbreviation, hogwash.  Stay well away from this thieving company.

Very bad customer service..
Evrytime they asked me security questions and then passed me to diffrent department and then security  questions again and then wrong department again.
No one in there seems to care in customer service bad maner and atitude....
Absolutely disgusted...

In my dealings with Global Payments / Realex I have always found them willing to help with any requests/queries I have had. In my last contact I had the pleasure of dealing with Sinead Martin as my point of contact, Sinead’s helpfulness and knowledge has made a routine query in to breeze and is a true asset to the organisation.
I spoke to Sinead Martin who was very helpful and stayed on the call until my query got sorted. Very peainleasant to deal with. Thanks Sinead.
Extremely quick in resolving my queries, very polite and easy to talk to.

Money for nothing.
High charges for terminal rental, high charges if you dont process minimum monthly transactions. 
No access to transaction history unless you take out a monthly subscription to their cloud service - making it very difficult to reconcile payments unless you maintain a PAPER trail. 
Require 30 day notice for cancellation even if beyond a minimum contract period. Charge for collection of the card machine.
Requirement to run a high level PCIDSS certification. 
Why bother when you can choose Stripe for cost efficient and slick online integrations and iZettle (or one of many such offerings) for Card Holder Present transactions. All of which provide significantly better functionality for both Merchant and Customer than Global Payments and at bother lower and predictable costs.
AVOID
I had to close my account because their services did not work and they took more than 200 pounds overall for cancellation fees. And if their machines do not work they can't help.
Graham was very helpful and walked through clearly. I have used this paltform for years so didn't require too much

Have had an account with Global for many years, they have a £20,000 security reserve that they have held for several years without any claims/problems. Received a phone call today advising that they want another £50,000 added to the reserve and that all card transactions are being held until they receive this. Our business structure has not changed and our accounts have improved year on year - no talking to them. Have been left as a small business with no card facilities - please avoid for the sake of your business

ABSOLUTELY APPALLING SERVICE AND COMMUNICATION.
Attempted to close account down 2 years ago...  continued to invoice us every month. Contacted them by Email, Letter, Special Delivery Letter... numerous attempts by telephone.
After many months , whilst still paying DD, I finally got through to an account manager. He acknowledged that the account should be closed. He promised to set any outstanding balances to ZERO and close the account correctly.
2 month later, account had been set to zero , new reminder invoices with a fresh accumulation of amounts owed.
Once again attempts to contact fruitless we are now over 6 months later and still no joy, just reminders every month to say we are in arrears.
Received an unconnected Customer Service called today, part of an advertising team.... HSBC now own Global and  could not do anything , She acknowledged that I am not the only customer with this problem and that she would make a note on my file.
Now considering ombudsman and Watchdog.
PLEASE USE AN ALTERNATIVE PROVIDER -- THIS HAS BEEN NOTHING BUT TROUBLE FOR YEARS.
Knowledgeable, efficient and pleasant to deal with
Phones are answered swiftly without being transferred. The operators are always very well informed and sort any issues out quickly over the phone. An example as to how business should be done.
Very knowledgeable, helpful and fast. My question was answered and a solution put in place immediately. Very helpful.
helpful and resourceful

Terrible attitude to customer service. I have had problems from day one, which always become worse than it needs to be because of a lack of adequate customer service. Emails are ignored, promises over the phone to deal with an issue and contact you are not followed through on, and when I closed my account, I was disconnected immediately from access to the payments portal, meaning I could not even check previous payments or refund clients. Emails about this were replied to discourteously "Your account is closed". Clearly bitter that we dared to close our account, and had no interest in even replying in a professional manner. 

Best decision I ever made, leaving Realex.

Expensive and unprofessional service provider! 

Make sure you do your homework and you will find cheaper and more professional companies out there to deal with. 

They partner with another company, namely Retail Merchant Services and they are no better. This combination just adds to confusion and the feeling that the left hand doesn't know what the right hand is doing.

I found it necessary to cancel my account as I decided to close my business premises and incurred hefty cancellation fees even with just a few months left until the end of my 18 month contract (£330). I accepted this as coming out of any contract prematurely has penalties. I paid the sum immediately and after asking if this was all that I owed to them I was advised that this was the end of the matter - oh no it wasn't! Global Payments sent me a disgraceful FINAL DEMAND letter for the princely sum of £14 and added that debt recovery agents would be used - with a whole page of the page and a half letter telling me what they would do with regards to recovering this outstanding amount. So much for customer service to a customer that had never defaulted always paid their fees on time and that had paid the cancellation notice promptly!

I obviously questioned this final demand as a matter of principle. The reply I received was that when I closed my account I did so at the start of the month. Apparently Global Payments calculate their invoices in the middle of the month, therefore they were not aware that there was a charge for the previous month (February) when I paid the closing balance (in March). How was I supposed to know about this, after all the machine was unused in February. I paid the final balance in good faith that the account was now clear, and I like many do not like receiving threatening letters when I have acted decently and paid my dues.

I find this totally unprofessional and time will tell if there is something else Global Payments will find that I owe them.

NO REASON TO SPEND THIS MUCH!!
definitely one of the most expensive and definitely one of the worst out there. A lot of other reviews will tell you this is a bad choice.

they took more than agreed from my account, time and time again, sometimes over £100. they couldn't explain why, which meant they couldn't refund it! what does that even mean!!!

after wasting my time and money on these con artists I found out my bank can provide the exact same thing for £3.99 a month.

I decided to leave the company (obviously) so I spoke to them and they said there would be a £120 charge for cancelling the contract, I was better to wait. so I waited (only 2 months left) and called again. they again said there would be a £120 charge for cancelling the contract.
turns out even if the contract has run its full term, they charge £120 to simply NOT renew it.

I paid the £120 and I have felt bitter and angry ever since.

Just look around, that's all I'm saying, its cheaper and better almost anywhere else, I have spent literally hundreds of pounds in 12 months on something that could have been £47.88 for the whole year

Tried setting up a new account and told someone will be in touch 24 hours.  No one rang so called back and it took ages for the call to be answered.  I was then informed SLA is 24-48 hours.  Still no phone call.  Rang back and was advised person on leave, at which point i lost the will to live....

Goodbye Global Payments!!!

I am fuming with Realex.  They overbilled me -  a small customer - back in December 2017 and refuse to refund MY money after 4 months of going back and to. You have admitted you owe me the money but for some unknown reason can't seem to send it back to me. I have wasted hours in calls and emails - why oh why is it so complicated to return MY money to me that you owe me.  If I owed you money you would debit it from my account without delay. Give me my money back!  Your business is payment processing - so process my refund.  It's an absolute farce.  Speak to DAVID COONEY who has been dealing with my complaint (or not dealing with it).

As a small charity, for which every cent counts, we recently had to seek help from Realex Customer service. We were assisted by a lovely lady called Polly Mc Dermot.  In these days were customer service so often is nothing more than "lip service"  Ms. Mc Dermot proofed that REAL customer service still exists. Ms. Mc Dermot went out of her way to assist us and even went high up the line to fight for us.  Just cannot praise her efforts high enough. Ms. Mc Dermot truly put her customer first!  What more can any RealEx client ask for ? 10 out of 10 is well deserved here!

consumer.displayName: Albert Kleyn. Cork ACS Company Director.

text:
For a such a big company its great to be able to talk to a local support agent, who knows what to do, and can fix things quickly and check logs where necessary without needing to elevate it.

Downtime is virtually non-existant
Very helpful, efficient customer service when setting up a new account, thank you!
Very happy with the migration team - Ryan in particular

Realex only care about large/multinational clients. One of my websites had an outage over the pre-Christmas sales, they don't seem to have a proper support ticketing system in place, consequently my request sank into the inbox of apathy. From my experience none of the staff are taught to care about the reputation of the company, they are only acting as individuals trying to win arguments. After working with them for 7 years they would not listen to my complaints. I tried to call a particular person for 6 months and every time I got the obvious 'he's in a meeting'. I never got called back. After a year of chasing at least an apology I finally found another person who would not accept responsibility for his colleagues actions.
I think rob is the best to make his service quick and perfect, I really enjoyed the service that he made for me, many thanks he became a very good friend of mine working together

This Global Payments company was the worst mistake I made since starting my business 5 years ago.  They absolutely will freeze your account often and hold your money you need to pay suppliers with hostage.  The messed up part is they cause you to get charge backs when they freeze your account out of the blue. Then they tell you the charge backs are your fault and your a high risk merchant. Again, they hold all your revenue every time they freeze your account.  Just stay the heck away from them.  Worst decision I have made with the company.  Honestly just look for another credit card processor.

The prices charged by global payments rise and rise and the service they provide falls and continues to fall further.

three times this month they have failed to pay monies due on time due to
"difficulties" at their end, They blame everybody else including the terminal manufacturers, which was simply an out and out lie.

I closed my account giving them 30 days notice. The best thing I ever did.
They are an absolute disgrace.
I have moved my card processing to Barclaycard. Friendly, efficient and half the price. I should have done it years ago.
Complete bunch of idiots with no customer service skills. completely refuse to update records with correct address or new directors so now we dont get the post they continually send to wrong address
received support from Maureen Maguire. She was very helpful and knowledgeable and the issue was quickly resolved.
Excellent service. Organised set up. Kieran ensured everything was set up in time for trading. Cannot fault Kieran or Global payments for their help in setting up my new business. Thank you.

Been with Realex for 2 years - last few months only needed to deal with their account department. Never seem to be there and don’t return calls. Feels like a very unprofessional and small company with poor communication if there is a problem. They also had difficulty taking direct payment from me, which is shocking for a payment company.

Good and informative representative (Kevin O'Driscoll)

My experience with Kevin has been a positive one, where he has been very responsive and answered all my questions. He gave impartial advice on the best option of services for my business.
Solid software, integrates well. Fast friendly tech team too.

I have been dealing with Global Payments for the last year and half and I have always been very happy with the service provided. The Gentleman who opened our account, Kevin O'Driscoll, is always on point and he always replies to my emails, calls and text messages in a matter of minutes. The customer service and the different payment terminals that we have received has always been impeccable and I am very happy to be their customer. I have told many business owners to use Global Payments and to go through Kevin to get the physical card machine and the online one.
Excellent customer service and very kind of looking after customers

Global Payments matched the price that we had from other suppliers and as we are banking with HSBC, we were happy to go with them. Nothing to say, great service so far ! Kieran was super easy to communicate with and very arranging.
i spoke with Maureen as we were having issue logging into our realex account have to say that she was very professtional and extremely helpfull and a credit to your company
I have passed many contacts onto Rob Mashuk as I know he is a reliable and trustworthy person. He always give clear and detailed advice with the personal touch that is lacking from others.
Quick, courteous, to the point and super helpful.

Meet with Rob Mashuk, Area Manager for the South West, yesterday who explained everything, clearly, precisely and in plain English. Very very happy to be going ahead with them, and moving away from Paypal.  Their service and attention to detail is excellent, looking forward to a long and profitable partnership.

AVOID GLOBAL PAYMENTS! ALL THEY DO IS TAKE YOUR MONEY AND NOT PROVIDE ANY CUSTOMER SERVICE WHATSOEVER!!! IT'S BEEN LITERALLY MONTHS AND STILL NOTHING HAS BEEN RESOLVED. I HAVE BEEN SIGNED ON FOR YEARS AND I HAVE NOT HEARD FROM ANY ACCOUNT MANAGERS AND THERE ARE MANY ADDED FEES WITHOUT ANY CONSENT. RUN RUN RUN

As a small business Global Payments provides everything we could possibly need...and more. While their rates are highly competitive, even more impressive has been their continued attention to detail and customer service. Nothing has been too much trouble for their area manager Jenny Mullins who was one of the key reasons we signed up with them. She outlined everything in plain English during the sign-up process leaving us in no doubt as to the facilities on offer, the cost, charges etc, meeting our expectations in every department.
Global Payments are million times better than WorldPay with whom we had nothing but problems.

I use Global Payments for my four websites and have used for many years for my retail site. My Area Manager for new start up's and ensuring all runs smoothly is Jenny Mullens. She is superb, efficient and if I do get any problems I simply contact her to assist me. The issues have been minor and what you would expect with running many sites. I want great service and a contact that I can deal with which I get with Global Payments. They keep my compliant with 'to do' reminders too which is great.

Graham has been the most helpful  and attentive advisor despite an extremely unconciliatory partner in my web builder choice , really impressed by his  kind and helpful advice and excellent t follow up skills  . Thanks again for your brilliant service !

I saw a lot of bad reviews and my Boss had also some issues in the past they were  very cheeky  if you don't do things in the right  way they wont remind you ... but instead they will charge you.
I gave 5 stars because i think the company is trying  to improve and they start to employ  new people nice, competent and helpful. 
I just opened a new business Kieran Heyhoe an area manager from global  payment has been great,  very helpful, kind and honest.
I definately would recommend  this company to anyone
Amazing customer service and very quick set/up and solution of issues
Excellent service throughout our transition to global payments, and continued  ongoing support made available to us.

At AFC Accountancy Services, we required a card machine provider who is reliable and provided a care-free solution. After having an initial meeting with Rob Mashuk, we felt Global Payments was the right partner for our firm and what our clients were looking for.

We have built a lasting relationship over the years. All our clients to date are happy with the service that Rob and Global Payments have provided to them and we'll continue to recommend him to our clients for the foreseeable future.

I needed a new card reader for events as my PayPal one broke when it was just over a year old.
The local manager Matt Whale explained clearly how I should apply.
It was very straightforward and the device arrived quickly.
I had trouble with my username / password as I'd accidentally deleted this email, so Matt even came round and sorted it all out for me. I really appreciated this!

I have been searching for a competent card provider to help taking card payments.
Global Payments came out on top not only did an Area Manager visit me to understand my business but also explained how the process of accepting card happens and costs involved. I thought card companies just  did 1 thing take money for you.
After having a meeting with Rob Mashuk  not only can we take payments in my unit but I can also see how my teams service is with a system called TruRating!
Also having my transactions checked by the online system is something I never thought was available.

Thank You Rob and Global Payments.
Rob comes highly recommended by me!!
I haven’t used the service yet but I am very happy with the service Kevin provided in helping me set up and his help with providing a payment system for my company. I would recommend
Graham and all staff dealt with were complete professionals.  Dealt with all queries very promptly and gave this novice all the help I needed

Great payment gateway, I would strongly recommend Realex system to any business, and especially their IT team, which were very helpful and positive through the entire setting process. Realex is one of the safest and fastest payment systems.
Always able to help and offer advice on how to use their solutions

Polly McDermott dealt with my queries today.
She was very pleasant to deal with and handled my queries professionally and efficiently.

A pleasant experience! The Company's  representative explained very clearly all the conditions for a confident  activation and for avoiding errors.
Not least helped to choose the most suitable option for our company at the current stage.

Further to my review of  23rd February and the “Customer Service” promise to respond that day or within 24 hours no response to yet another attempt to confirm rhe situation in 1st March.
It appears that they simply delay and delay to try and encourage you to use their high rate call lines. 
Very poor and automated customer service unless you pay for the privelage of being their customer.
We have left the ball in their court to respond. 
Despite us trying to communicate with them in this matter which continues to disrupt our family business they simply ignore the complaint which we have a customer complaint number.

Total bunch of idiots..they have been charging me for a service I was mis-sold and I'm stuck in a contract with them. Really looking forward to not being charged £50 per month for compliance checks when I have filled this information out. AVOID!!!

I recently joined Global Payments from Worldpay. I was changing provider because i had issues with my PDQ & being a pub & restaurant i cannot function without the ability to take card payments. I like many others looked in global payments to provide a mobile terminal for card processing and they lure you in with a great package for the first year, forgetting to mention that there will be extra charges for PCI complanace. If you don't use who they direct you towards you will be charged £50 plus for not having it.
once you have got through the paperwork for that dont even bother trying to login using the same details to redo the compliance forms as they have "lost them". How can you loose them, thay are on your so called secure server are they not!!!!!
So come time to leave you spend 20mins trying to get through to the right department who then as you all the questions under the sun to them put you on hold to put you through to another person who will them ask the same questions.

I have been with Global Payments for 9 months now and have to say I am very unhappy with the charges but completely shocked at the aftercare service. After calling around a few other processing companies (Payzone, Worldpay, First Data) it became immediately evident that we've been overcharged by Global Payments. We've been with them as long as we've been in business because they were the default choice offered by our bank HSBC. It's sickening to see how much money we've paid to them and how much we could potentially have saved over the last 8-9 years. On top of this their bills are complex and their online billing system for retrieving invoices is clunky and outdated. They also don't assist with PCI DSS compliance (unlike Payzone for example who manage everything on your behalf) and instead palm you off on to SecurityMetrics who are equally overpriced. After a lot of research we moved to Payzone who sent down a rep (none of the other processing companies bothered to do this) and highlighted various areas where we were spending unnecessarily. We've run the figures and are saving £2,319.48 annually in processing fees plus £1,200 in PCI DSS non compliance fees despite being compliant.
The smack in the face was that Global Payments were actually prepared to match Payzone's offer to keep our business but after realising how much they've ripped us off over the last 8-9 years there's no incentive whatsoever for us to continue using them. 
In short, if you're looking for a processing partner then stay well clear of Global Payments. If you're already with Global Payments then give them notice you want out and find a company who treats you better and is far more competitive on price. My personal recommendation would be Payzone but World Pay were also very competitive. First Data were slow to respond to emails and didn't seem very interested in the business.

I work with quite a few PSPs and I have found Realex to have the most helpful and knowledgeable staff of any of them. They are quick to respond to any queries and account changes. They understand that changes are often required quickly, and react accordingly. They are also very patient...! The back-office system (Realcontrol) is very easy to use and modern - better than most back office systems.

Their pricing is very fair - you will struggle to find better value among European PSPs. Many other PSPs have hidden charges which quickly add up - account change fees, charging for additional services etc. They are partnered with a good range of acquirers, so you will be able to negotiate with a few acquirers to get a good deal - particularly true if you only require card charging.

As one of Realex's first Irish customers we have been with them a long time which is testament to a quality service in a growing competitive space. No issue recommending them to anyone looking for a quality payment solution.

Payment gateway implementations and integrations can get fiddly. Over the past 18 months, the Realex team has provided responsive, knowledgeable and useful support on several set ups. text: I was very happy with the work completed by Niamh Coyle of Realex. She was complete and efficient throughout the set up.

I recently received customer support from Ciara Hanafin at Realex Payments. I found her  to be extremely helpful, professional and genuinely interested in sorting out our issue.
I am very pleased with the support provided, both in solving issues and for advice.

I was tasked with building a bespoke website with an e-commerce system to take payments, using coldfusion which is not as well known as it used to be proved to be difficult as documentation was not available. However working with Realex and specifically Daniel Jaffray, I managed to get it working with 3DSecure in no time. Daniels help and patience was the winning factor at the end of the day. I have been using Realex for nearly 7 years now and have multiple clients using their payments system through my e-commerce solutions. Thank you Realex.

After a recent audit I was asked to conduct a review of all users on our realex accounts ebsrcm and haven mortgages. I contacted realex to request a list of all users on the realex system. As there had never been a review of the system done before between both accounts there were over 900 user ID’s to be deleted. I was also under time pressure to get this done by a deadline. I spoke with Daniel in realex many times during the review. We went back and forth with updated lists ensuring all deletions were completed correctly. Daniel was so helpful. He answered all of my queries big or small and was always quick to get back to me. I realise that my request was more than likely outside of Daniel’s remit but he was always professional and I felt like I could pick up the phone to him at any stage and he would investigate my query and get back to me as soon as he had an answer. I would just like to say thank you so much to Daniel and the team at realex for all your help with this audit and for making my job that bit easier, your help and understanding was much appreciated.

We have been with Realex for over 3 years. We have had an incident free time with Realex and are confident it can be for some more. The only downside is that they do not support some of the Merchant platforms. Do your research first. 

One day we called to track some information regarding our Merchant account (the Merchant company couldn't even answer those). Luckily, I ended up on the line with a really helpful lady from Realex who helped a lot. Even so there was no need from them to do so. 

We recommend Realex.

We were extremely happy with Realex and may I add that the level of service that we received was exemplary at all times and a special mention for Eoin O’Leary, he is an asset to your company, his patience with our situation was really appreciated.

Realex Payments has played a significant role in Alternative Airlines’ development as the specialist online travel agency booking lesser known airlines and remote destinations worldwide. Realex Payments promised to deliver a reliable, secure and a tailored payment processing service supported by first class operations support. In every sense, Realex Payments has surpassed these promises.   

Realex Payment’s relationships with alternative payment providers such as Paypal and Sofort has enabled Alternative Airlines to extend its product offering to our customers. Throughout the integration of these payment methods, Realex Payments’ operations team provided us with immediate support and guidance. As an online travel agency, Realex Payments’ fraud scoring tool has provided us with an effective fraud management solution to minimise fraudulent transactions and the operational costs associated with chargebacks. 

The reliability and functionality of Realex Payments, combined with a dedicated operations support who understand Alternative Airlines and react to any issues instantly, makes Realex Payments a great partner to work with.

adrian minnock has made this experience very easy. He has called me on a regular basis helping to set up the account. he has given me all the help i needed. He seems to be a very kind man and a credit to your company. the 5 stars go to adrian alone

I manage the e-commerce facilities for a client who were in the process of switching shopping carts and starting a new Realex merchant account. text: We have used Realex for 5 years now for our e-commerce shop and online terminal and find it an excellent and trustworthy system with highly professional and technical staff. We recently set up a new company and are delighted with the way it was handled and managed through Realex. Any issue was solved within minutes and our account manager Nicholas Gordon was on hand to guide our IT consultants through the process. We would highly recommend Realex for any business.

I have had nothing but positive experiences dealing with Realex. Requests for support or service are always dealt with in a timely manner. Staff are prompt and courteous in dealing with requests. Overall, a very positive, efficient, and reliable service. First Class.

I have been using Realex Payments for the last three years and would  highly recommend to anyone looking for an efficient payment processing service. It is very user-friendly and can be easily integrated with websites, etc. I am very excited to start using RealexVault for processing recurring payments. Another huge advantage of using Realex Payments is their incredibly efficient and helpful customer support team. It is a real pleasure to deal with them and you are guaranteed a speedy response to your query. Keep up your good work Realex!
Much faster turnaround on requests over the last year than before. Keep it up!

Overall our experience with Realex has been a positive one. The site is easy to navigate and we have experienced no technical or security issues. Customer service has always been of a high standard and have solved any problems we had in a swift and efficient manner.

If we were to change one thing it would be the frequency of the payments. For a company our size, weekly payments would be more suitable than daily payments so that we can keep our bank charges down.

1) No dedicated Account Manager.  Always receive difference agents anytime we call through to the general phone line.  Have asked for dedicated Account Manager numerous times.
2) No notification of when system goes down or escalation process. Asked repeatedly for notifications for when system is down but cannot seem to be able to notify customers.  It's normally us notifying Realex.
